title: Izisu ezigcwele ziholela emiphumeleni engcono
author: More Matshediso
text:
hulumeni eNingizimu Afrika yonkana abakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo wesikole ngenxa yohlelo lukahulumeni oluqinisekisa ukuthi izisu zabo zigcwele ukudla okunempilo.
UMnyango Wezemfundo Eyisisekelo (i-DBE), ngoku- sebenzisa uHlelo Lokuhli- nzeka Ngokudla Okune- mpilo Ezikoleni (i-NSNP), usebenze waze weqa umgo- mo wawo wokuhlinzeka ngokudla kubafundi bakule- li abangama-75%.
Umqondisi we-NSNP kulo
mnyango, uNeo Rakwena, uthe izikole eziyizi-20 619 zipheka futhi ziphakele abafundi abalinganiselwa kuzi-9 032 622 ezweni nsu- ku zonke.
Uthe izikole ezingabanda- kanywanga ohlelweni ku- mele ziqonde emahhovisi esifunda uma zifuna ukuba yingxenye yohlelo.
Onyakeni wezimali wezi- 2015/16, isabelomali esabe- lwe lolu hlelo silinganise- lwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi- 5 703 zamarandi. URakwe-
na uthe imali esetshenziswa ohlelweni iyakhushulwa minyaka yonke ukuze ku- hlangatshezwane nokukhu- phuka kwamanani ezinto, is- abelomali sonyaka wezimali wezi-2017/18 silinganiselwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi-6.4 zam- arandi.
Lolu hlelo luqeda indla-
la yesikhashana futhi lube negalelo esimweni senhla- lakahle yabafundi.
Uthe, "Izingane eziningi zi- buya emakhaya adla imbu- ya ngothi, futhi kwabanye abafundi, ukudla kwase- sikoleni yikho kuphela ukudla abakudlayo ngosu- ku. Ukudla okutholakala esikoleni kubanikeza umd- landla wokufunda, bakwazi ukugxilisa umqondo kanye nokuzibandakanya eklasi- ni.”
Ukubhaliswa  esikoleni 
kanye nokuya esikoleni kwabafundi kuthuthukile ngenxa yohlelo lokuhlinze- kwa kwezingane ngokudla. Kamuva nje, iKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMbiko Wokuhlola i-NSNP odidiyewe uMnyango We- zokuhlela, Ukuqapha kanye Nokuhlola (i-DPME). Lo mbiko ubonakalisa impu- melelo kanye nezinyathe-
lo ezithathiwe ukuze ku- thuthukiswe lolu hlelo.
UMqondisi Wezokuhlo- la ku-DPME, uJabu Mathe, uthe inhlosongqangi yoku- hlola wukuhlola ukuthi ingabe i-NSNP iqaliswa ngendlela engaholela em- phumeleni omuhle ozohlo- mulisa abafundi maqondana nezempilo kanye nezemfu- ndo.
Ugcizelele ukuthi inhlo-
songqangi yohlelo isiyonke ukuthuthukisa isimo seze- m p i l o  k a n y e  n e - sok ondlek a k wab afun - di ababuya eminde- nini edla imbuya ngothi eNingizimu Afrika. Lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubafun- di abafunda ezikoleni zika- hulumeni eziku quintile 1-3, okungamaphesenti anga- ma-60 ezikole ezinezingane eziqhamuka emindenini em- pofu eNingizimu Afrika.
Uhlelo  luphinde  lusize 
ukuqeda ubub ha emi - phakathini ngokudala ama- thuba omsebenzi.
"Ngenkathi kuhlolwa ku- tholakale ukuthi i-NSNP ihlinzeka abantu abalungi- selela abafundi ukudla ben- gaholelwa, abangaphezu kwezi-50 000 minyaka yon- ke, ngethuba lokukhokhe-
lwa isibonelelo semali yokugibela okungama-960 amarandi ngenyanga," ku- sho uMathe.
"Sekukonke kwakha inani lwezibonelelo eziyizigidi ezingama- 576 zamarandi ngonyaka ezisiza amalungu omphakathi."
Uhlelo luphinde lusimamise ukuqhutshwa kwemisebe- nzi ethuthukisa ezomnotho njengamabhizinisi aman- cane nasafufusa kanye nezigungu ezisebenza ngokubambisana, phecelezi ama-co-operatives okuyi- wo azuzayo njengabahli- nzeki bemisebenzi kulezo zifundazwe ezinezindawo ezihlinzeka ngemisebenzi eziqhelelene (KwaZulu-Na- tali, eGauteng, eMpumala- nga naseNyakatho Kapa).
Ukutholakala  kwemifi-
no endaweni kunamathu- ba okuhlomulisa izikole nemiphakathi kuphin - de kuthuthukise ezolimo zasendaweni.
Umbiko uphinde waveza ukuthi Ntshonalanga Kapa, iMpumalanga, iGauteng, iMpumalanga Koloni, i- Nyakatho Kapa kanye ne- Nyakatho Ntshonalanga yi- zifundazwe osekuneminya- ka  zaluqalisa  lolu  hlelo 
ngempumelelo.

title: I-Central Application Clearing House (i-CACH) Yowezi-2018
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Central Application Clearing House, ebizwa ngokuthi yi-CACH, umzamo wesikhashana woMnyango Wemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqesha yasungulwa uMnyango Wemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqesha ukuze isize abafundi abafuna izikhala zokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme abafisa ukungena oHlelweni LweMfundo Elandela
Ukuqeda Isikole Nokuqeqeshwa (i-PSET) kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi ibhekene nesimo lapho:
Befake isicelo kusenesikhathi ezikhungweni zemfundo abazikhethile kodwa izicelo zabo zachithwa, manje osekuphele isikhathi sokubhalisa kwesinye isikhungo.
Labo abazoba ngabafundi abangasifakanga isicelo ngoba bengakwazanga ukuthola imiphumela edingekayo kuBanga
le-11 ukuze babhalise kodwa bathole ukuthi imiphumela yabo yeBanga le-12 iyahlangabezana nalokho okudingekayo ukuze babhalise.
Abangazange basifake isicelo ngesikhathi ngenxa yesizathu esithile noma abangazange basifake nhlobo isicelo.
Abangazi nhlobo ukuthi bazofundani lapho beqeda umatikuletsheni.
Abazi kancane ngalokho abafuna ukukufunda kodwa abangenasiqiniseko ukuthi ingabe lo mkhakha ubalungele na.

Imisebenzi ehlinzekwa i-CACH
Izicelo zamathuba okufunda e-PSET (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi Obuchwepheshe, emakolishi emfundo yezobuchwepheshe namakhono emisebenzi kanye nokuqeqeshwa kanye ne-Sector Education and Training Authorities).
Ulwazi mayelana nosizo lwezimali (Ulwazi lwe-NFSAS).
Imisebenzi yokuthuthukisa amakhono omsebenzi (ukwelulekwa, ulwazi, iseluleko kanye nokuhlelela umsebenzi/ulwazi ngalokho ongakukhetha maqondana noxhaso kanye nokuthola imali yokufunda).
Ukwesekwa kwabafundela imisebenzi yezandla (Isikhungo Sokweseka Ukuthuthukiswa Kwemisebenzi Yezandla Kuzwelonke).

Imisebenzi ye-CACH iqala ngomhla ka 3 kuMasingana 2018, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa kusanda kuphuma imiphumela yokuhlolwa ye-NSC futhi izosebenza kuze kube sekupheleni kukaNhlolanja 2018.

I-CACH isebenza kanjani?
Isigaba 1: Abafundi abangasitholi isikhala ezikhungweni abafake izicelo kuzo, noma abafuna amathuba okufunda e-PSET, bangaxhumana ne-CACH kunombolo yamahhala (0800 356 635), iwebhusayithi (www.dhet.gov.za) noma ngomyalezo we-SMS ojwayelekile (thumela igama nge-SMS ku 49200) noma bangabhalisa online. Eminye imininingwane ungayithola ekhasini labo le- Facebook (CACH_SA).
Isigaba 2: Ama-ejenti azoshayela umfundi, ofuna isikhala sokufunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ucingo mahhala, ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sezingcingo, kubhaliswe nemininingwane kusizindalwazi se-CACH, kuhlonzwe umkhakha umfundi awubhalisele kanye nesifundazwe afisa ukufunda kuso.
Isigaba 3: Imininingwane eqondene nomfakisicelo kanye nemiphumela kamatikuletsheni kuzoqinisekiswa futhi kudluliselwe esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ngokuzenzakalela ukuze mhlawumbe umfundi abhaliswe noma
afakwe esikhungweni.
Isigaba 4: Imisebenzi ye-CACH izoqinisekisa imininingwane yomfundi futhi iyidlulisele ezikhungweni ezisenezikhala. Lapho kukhona izikhala, abafakisicelo behlangabezana
nakho konke okudingekayo, kuzoxhunywana nezikhungo ngqo.

Amaphuzu okumele Aqashelwe
I-CACH ayikwazi ukuqinisekisa umfakisicelo ukuthi uzosithola isikhala.
I-CACH ayikwazi ukubona ukuthi isikhungo sizomthinta nini umfakisicelo ukuze mhlawumbe athole isikhala.

I-CACH isiza abafakisicelo abangenasiqiniseko sokuthi bafuna ukufundani noma labo abangahlangabezani nalokho okudingekayo ukuze bangene Ohlelweni i-PSET?
Imisebenzi ye-CACH isebenza ngokubambisana neSikhungo Sokuthuthukisa Imisebenzi Kuzwelonke (i-NCDS) esiza ngokuhlinzeka ngolwazi lwezemisebenzi olunzulu kanye neseluleko mayelana:
Imisebenzi kanye nemikhakha efundwayo
Ukukhetha isifundo.
Ulwazi ngokuhlola kokuchibiyela.
Ukulungiswa kwemiphumela yakamatikuletsheni.
Amathuba okufunda ahlinzekwa uhlelo lwe- PSET.
Izindlela ezingakhethwa zoxhaso kanye nosizo lwezezimali.
Ulwazi ngezinqubo zesicelo kanye nezinsuku zokuvala.
Ukufakwa kwesicelo kwengxenye yesibili yonyaka kanye nezinsuku zokubhalisa.
Noma ubani onentshisekelo emisebenzini ehlinzekwe ama-CDS angaxhumana nophiko lwezosizo lwe-CDS ngokusebenzisa izinkundla ezilandelayo:
Thumela umbuzo wakho nge-SMS noma uthumele umyalezo othi “please call me” ku: 072 204 5056, noma
Shayela u: 086 999 0123, okuyinombolo ehlanganyelwayo, kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu phakathi kwehora lesi-8 ekuseni nelesi-4:30 ntambama,
Thumela i-imeyli ku:
careerhelp@dhet.gov.za
Vakashela amahhovisi ethu ku: 123 Francis Baard Street, Pretoria.
Ku-Facebook ku:
www.facebook.com/careerhelp, noma
Ku-Twitter ku:
www.twitter.com/rsacareerhelp

Amathuba okuxhaswa uhulumeni ngemali yokufunda?
Kunamathuba ahlukahlukene atholakalayo Isihambeli okuxhaswa ngemali ukuze ufunde esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ahlinzekwa: uHlelo loMfundaze i-Funza Lushaka , uHlelo Lokusiza Abafundi Ngemali Yokufunda (i-NSFAS)e, uHlelo Lokuthola Imfundo Lwabantu Basemakhaya, uMnyango
Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi, uMnyango Wezesayensi Nezobuchwepheshe kanye noMnyango Wezempilo.

Ngubani okufanele afake isicelo sozizo lwezimali?
Abafundi baseNingizimu Afrika abangathanda ukufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha bayamenywa ukuthi bavakashele amaHhovisi Osizo Lwezezimali esikhungweni abazikhethele sona.

title: Ukuphathwa ngesizotha kwezisulu zokunukubezwa ngokocansi
author: Noluthando Motswai
text:
“Njengomnyango, sipho kophelele impilo engcono kubo bonke ngokuqeqesha nokuhlomisa odokotela nga makhono akhethekile okupha tha izisulu zalobu bugebengu. Eminyakeni emithathu edlule, odokotela abayi-106 baphothule isifundo i-Sexual Assault Care Practitioner Course.”Uthe umnyango wakhe uzoqhubeka nokubambisana nezinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni (ama-NGO) nezinye izinhlangano esibambisene nazo  ezisiza ngokuhlinzeka ngokwesekwa kwezengqondo nokuziphatha emphakathini lapho kugci zelelwa kakhulu ukuvikela ngaphezu kokunakekelwa kwangemva kwesehlakalo sodlame.
AmaThuthuzela Care Centre ayesungulelwe ukuphucula inqubo yokubikwa kwezehlakalo zokudlwengulwa kanye namanye amacala oca-nsi. Izisulu manje sezisizakala endaweni eziphatha ngesizotha nasendaweni enozwelo nokunakekela.
Izikhungo ziqalwe Luphiko Lwezokushushisa Lukazwelonke (i-NPA) , kanye  nMnyango wezeMpilo, Owezo kuthuthukiswa Komphakathi kanye nowezokuThuthukiswa koMthethosisekelo, kanjalo noMbutho Wamaphoyisa ase Ningizimu Afrika (i-SAPS).
Kunezikhungo eziyisikho mbisa eGauteng. Esokuqala savulwa e-Chris Hani Bara-gwanath Hospital ngowezi-2000.
UDkt Efadzwa Tipoy, imene nja ephezulu kwezokwelapha nokunguye ohola i-Sinakeke lwe Thuthuzela Care Centre, weluleke amalungu ompha kathi ukuthi uma kwenzeka eba yizisulu zamacala ocansi, kusemqoka kakhulu ukuba abike isehlakalo esikhungweni ngokushesha.
“Izikhungo zibandakanya ukwelashwa kokugwema ukuthola izifo ezithathelana ngocansi kubandakanya isifo sesibindi (i-Hepatitis B) negci wane leSandulelangculazi (i-HIV). Amaphilisi okuvikela ukukhulelwa ngenxa yesehlakalo lesi sezocansi nawo ayanikezwa. Ungagezi. Woza nezingubo obuzigqo kile esikhungweni zisongwe ngephepha elinsundu hhayi esikhwameni socwazi,” kusho uDkt Tipoy.
Wengeze ngokuthi selokhu kwavulwa isikhungo, baningi abantu abasebenzisa izinsiza abazihlinzekayo futhi baphathwa ngendlela enesithu nzi abantu abayizisulu futhi bakwazi nokugeza eshaweni emva kokuxilongwa.
Enye yezinselele ezibhe kene nomtholampilo ukuthi esikhathini esiningi abantu bafika emva kwesikhathi – kubalulekile ukuthi kuthathwe ubufakazi umuntu anikezwe nemithi singekapheli isikhathi esingamahora angama-72 kwenzeke isehlakalo sokuhlaselwa.

title: Izinsana zisengcupheni enkulu ye-Listeriosis
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
uMnyango weze Mpilo sewuku fakele amehlo  lokhu kubheduka kwesifo se-Listeriosis, njengoba se kubikwe ukuthi bayi-119 abantu abatheleleke yilesi sifo kusukela ngomhla ka-5 kuZibandlela. Isibalo esiphelele esiqiniseki swe elabhorethri sabantu abahlaselwe yilesi sifo ngonyaka wezi-2017 ngama-727.
Isikhungo Sokulawulwa Nokuvikelwa Kwezifo sicha ze i-Listeriosis  njengesifo esibucayi kodwa esilaphe kayo futhi esigwemeka yo esibangwa yigciwane le-Listeria monocytogenes.
Leli gciwane litholakala  enhlabathini, emanzini kanye nasezitshalweni. Imikhiqizo yezilwane – efana nenyama nemikhiqizo yobisi, izidlo zasolwandle kanye nemikhi qizo emisha njengemifino nezithelo kungaba naleli gciwane.
Yize noma ngubani ongatheleleka yi-Listeriosis, labo abasengcupheni enkulu yokungenwa yilesi sifo babandakanya izinsana ezisanda kuzalwa, abantu asebeluphele, abesifazane abakhulelwe, kanye naba ntu abanamasosha omzi mba antekenteke njenga-bane-HIV , isifo sikashukela, umdlavuza, isifo sezinso noma esesibindi esingumahla lakhona.
Abantu abathinteka  kakhulu yilabo abayizinsana ezinezinsukwana zizelwe – izinsana ezinezinsuku ezi ngama-28 zizelwe, nabantu abaneminyaka ephakathi kweyi-15 nengama-49. Aba-ntu abanale minyaka yobudala bangama-70% abantu bonke abanalesi sifo.
Umnyango usunxuse abesifazane abakhulelwe ukuba babhalise kuMomConnect  ukuze bathole izindaba zakamuva ze-Listeriosis nje ngoba izingane ezinezinsuku ezingaphansi kwezingama-28 kuyizo ezithinteka kakhulu.
“Uma sibuka amanani abantu abathinteke kakhulu, siyaqaphela ukuthi kuwo wonke la maqembu abantu abasengcupheni enkulu, izinsana ezisanda kuzalwa yizona ezithinteka kakhulu. Uma sihlaziya ngamaqembu eminyaka kusukela ekuzalweni kuya eminyakeni engama-93 ubudala, izinsana ezisanda kuzalwa zizodwa nje zicishe zifinyelele kuma--40% abantu abanalesi sifo,” kusho uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Aaron Mo tsoaledi.  UNgqongqoshe uphinde wanxusa abasebenzi beze mpilo ukuba baqikelele nakakhulu uma besiza abesifazane abakhulelwe.
“Isicelo esiyisipesheli kubasebenzi bezempilo no-mphakathi wonkana ukuba banakekele abesifazane aba khulelwe kakhulu. Qikelela ngokwengeziwe uma ubhe kene nowesifazane okhule lwe noma usana olusanda kuzalwa,” kusho yena.

title: Siza ukulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi
author: More Matshediso
text:
Ngokwe-DWS kube nokuntuleka kwezimvula futhi kwehla nezinga lamanzi emadamini.
Lokhu sekwenze iziphathi mandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqi nile ukunweba isikhathi sokufika kosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lapho amathangi azobe omile.
IDolobha laseKapa liqala imikhawulo yezinga u-6B. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi kuzoba nomkhawulo wansuku zonke wamalitha amanzi angama-50 noma  angaphansi kumuntu ngamunye, osekhaya, emsebenzini, esikoleni noma kwenye indawo.
Njengoba idolobha ligxile emizamweni yokulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lithe lidinga ukulungiselela isimo lapho lizokwazi ukulawula uhlelo lwedolobha lokuthunyelwa kwamanzi ukuze kuze kufike ubusika.
“Sizokuvala ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi kompompi uma amadamu ethu efika ezingeni elingu-13.5%. Uma izinga lamadamu lifika ku-13.5%, bazoqala ukuvala amapayipi athumela amanzi, ngaphandle kwezindawo zezamabhizinisi ezisemqoka kanye nezikhungo, ezifana nezibhedlela,” ngokulandisa kwedo-lobha esitatimendeni salo.
Uma sekufika lesi sikhathi, izakhamuzi zizokwazi ukuthola amanzi ezizindeni eziphakela ngamanzi edolobheni lonkana. Isakhamuzi ngasinye sizokwabelwa amalitha amanzi anga ma-25 ngosuku.
Idolobha selivule Isikhungo Esisebenza Ngezinhlekelele (i-DOC) ukusebenzisa Uhlelo Lwamanzi Lwenhlekelele, oluzoqala uma sekufike usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi.
AmapitsiIdolobha selikugxekile ukuse-tshenziswa kwamapitsi futhi lathi ukusetshenziswa kwawo ukuze kuniselwe kuzoba ihora elilodwa kuphela ngoLwesibili kanye nangoMgqibelo, ngaphambi kwehora lesi-9 ekuseni futhi ngemuva kwehora lesi-6 ntambama.
“Ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi okanye imithombo yama-nzi kufanele kukalwe ngamamitha futhi bonke abakusebenzi-sayo bagcine amarekhodi azo-tholakala uma kufanele ahlo-lwe,” kusho idolobha.
Lengeze ngokuthi izakhamuzi kufanele zithole imvume ku-DWS uma zifuna ukudayisa noma ukuthenga amanzi asemapitsini/nasemithonjeni yamanzi.
Njengomzamo kahulumeni wokulawula ukusetshenzi-swa kwamanzi, i-DWS ithe iziphathimandla zibeke izi-nyathelo eziqinille ukuqikelela ukuthi ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ngendlela ebekelwe imikhawu-lo kuyalandelwa.
Idolobha futhi lisebenzisana nethimba eliqinisekisa uku landelwa komthetho kanye noPhiko Oluphenyayo Olu-khethekile ukuqikelela ukula-ndelwa komthetho.
Ukuthathela izinyathelo abaphula umthetho Umnyango ngokuhlanganyela nedolobha usanda kugasela eMfuleni, ugxile ezenzweni zokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ngokungekho semthethweni.
Lo mkhankaso kuhloswe ngawo ukudingida ukuphu-lwa kwemithetho kwamanje kanye nokulandela imikhawulo yamanzi, futhi uqondiswe ikakhulukazi ezikhungweni eziwasha izimoto ngokungekho emthethweni.
“Ngokwamazinga emikhawulo 6B yedolobha, amanzi kama sipala angaphuzwa ngeke ase-tshenziswe ukuwasha izimoto. Izindawo zokuwasha izimoto ezingekho emthethweni zisebenzisa amanzi amaningi. Abanikazi bezindawo zokuwasha izimoto abaningi basebe-nzisa ompompi abafakelwe umphakathi emabhizinisini abo, abanye basebenzisa amanzi ompompi babo,” kuchaza umnyango.
Nakuba emaningi amanxusa amanzi azimisele asebenzayo ukusiza ukunqanda usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi,  idolobha licele izakhamuzi ukuba zidlale indima yazo ekongeni amanzi.
“Sifuna bonke abasebenzisa amanzi bajoyine imizamo ye-Dolobha laseKapa,” ngokusho kwePhini likaSodolobha waseKapa u-Ian Neilson.

title: Buyisa amandla akho, bika ngokunukubezwa
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Okhulumela amaphoyisa ase Mpumalanga uColonel Mtsholi Bhembe uthe kubalulekile ukuba umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa futhi ubike lobu bugebengu.
"Njengamaphoyisa, kuwum sebenzi wethu ukudlala indi ma enkulu ukuqinisekisa uku thi ababhebhezeli bayabanjwa futhi izisulu zobugebengu zi sezandleni eziphephile. Sicela ukuba umphakathi uze ubike amacala okudlwengulwa eziteshini zamaphoyisa eziseduzane,” kuqhuba uBhembe.
Izisulu zokunukubezwa kufanele zibike ubugebengu bezocansi emaphoyiseni engakapheli amahora angama-72 kwenzeke ubugebengu.
UBhembe uyalele izisu lu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zifune usizo lokululekwa ngemuva kwezigameko ezithusayo ezibuhlungu.
"Ungazizwa ungcolile futhi ugeze uphindelela futhi usabe ukuphuma. Akukho okungajwayelekile kulokhu futhi nokungaqhelekile. Kufanele ukhumbule ukuthi kunosizo olutholakalayo ukukusiza,” esaqhuba.
I-Greater Rape Intervention Project (i-GRIP) enye yezinhlangano ezisiza izisulu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zihlole Igciwane Lesandulela-ngculazi (i-HIV) neNgculazi (i-Aids) nezinye izifo.
Usonhlalakahle we-GRIP uThandiwe Maseko uthe le nhlangano inakekela izisulu zokudlwengulwa.
"Sihlinzekela ngokunakekela futhi sivumele izisulu zihlale endlini lapho ziqashwe khona zize zikulungele ukukhuluma.
Sinabaluleki abaphambili futhi abanakekelayo kakhulu abalindele ukukusiza,” ngokusho kwakhe.
Libikwa kanjani emaphoyiseni icala lokudlwengulwa:
■ Okokuqala, hamba uye emtholampilo ukuze uhlolwe.
Umbiko uzoba ingxenye yefayele lecala futhi uzosiza amaphoyisa ukubamba umsolwa.
■ Bese uya esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze uvule icala. Iphoyisa lizobuza imininingwane eqondene nawe futhi nokukwehlele. Phendula ngokuthembeka futhi uzame ukukhumbula imininingwane eminingi. Kungaba uhlelo olubuhlungu, kodwa imininingwane izosiza uma sekwenziwa uphenyo.  ■ Cela inombolo yokuxhumana nomphenyi, ukuze ukwazi ukuxhumana naye ngeminye imininingwane. Umphenyi uzophinde axhumane nawe uma kudingeka eminye imininingwane.

title: Sindisani obhejane bakithi
author: More Matshediso
text:
Umbiko, ohlanganisa nekota yokugcina yowezi-2017, ukhombisa inqubekela phambili ngokuphathelene nenani la-baboshiwe, uphenyo kanye nabazingela bese beshushu mbisa izimpondo zobhejane asebegwetshiwe kanye nokwe-hla kancane kwesibalo sobhe-jane abazingelwa kuzwelonke ngowezi-2017 (1028), uma kuqhathaniswa nowezi-2016 (1054).
Ngowezi-2017 kwaba khona ukwemukwa kwezimpondo zobhejane okuyisishiyagalo mbili Esikhumulweni Sezindiza i-OR Tambo International futhi kwaboshwa abangama-502 abasolwa ngokuzingela obhe jane nabayi-16 abasolwa ngo kushushumbisa izimpondo zobhejane, nokwaholela eku-theni isibalo sibe ngama-518, sehla sisuka kuma-680 ngowe-zi-2016.
“Kuyadumaza ukuthi, abasebenzi bethu abangama-21 baboshelwa ukuzibandaka nya nokuzingelwa kobhejane ngowezi-2017,” kusho uNgqongqoshe uMolewa.
Ukunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejaneUhulumeni kanye nabambi sene nabo sebesebenzise izi ndlela ezahlukene nokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane, ezi hlanganisa izinhlelo zokuqapha eziqiwini zikazwelonke kanye nokusebenzisa ubuchwe pheshe obuguqula isimo.
Phakathi kukaMasingana kanye noZibandlela wezi-2017, kwazingelwa obhejane abanga-ma-504 e-Kruger National Park (KNP), nokungamaphesenti ehle ngama-24 kunama-662 angowezi-2016.
“Ngenxa yendlela yokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane e-KNP sibona yehla imizamo yokuzingelwa kobhejane esiqiwini, kuqoshwe izi-2662 ngowezi-2017 uma kuqhatha-niswa nezi-2883 ngowezi-2016. Lokhu kukhombisa ukwehla kwamaphesenti ngo-7.6,” ku-qinisa uNgqongqoshe.
Noma kunjalo, sekwenyuke isibalo sobhejane abazingelwe KwaZulu-Natali, eNyakatho Kapa, eMpumalanga, eFreyi stata kanye nasesiFundazweni saseNyakatho-Ntshonalanga.
Umthelela kwezomnothoUkuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi lwane kunomthelela omubi ekuthuthukisweni komnotho wezwe kanye nasekudalweni kwamathuba omsebenzi, oku-hlanganisa ukuthuthukiswa komnotho onhlobonhlobo wezemvelo ohlanganisa no mkhakha wezokuvakasha.
“Ukulahleka kohlobo lwezi lwane oluyingqalabutho kakhulu lwaseNingizimu Afrika olufana nobhejane, nongesinye ‘Sezilwane Ezinku-lu Ezinhlanu’ kungaba nomthe-lela omubi ngokuphathelene nenani lezivakashi eNingizimu Afrika. Izivakashi eziningi eziza eNingizimu Afrika zizela ukuzobona Izilwane Ezinhlanu Ezinkulu, nokuwubhejane, ibhubesi, inyathi, ingwe kanye nendlovu,” kusho isitatimende soMnyango Wezendawo.
Ukuzingelwa kobhejane sekwaziswe njengengozi yezokuphepha ezweni, enga ba nomthelela kuamanani ezivakashi ezivakashela izwe, futhi uhulumeni usememezele ukuthi kuwubugebengu obuse qhulwini kuzwelonke.
Izenzo ezingekho semthe thweni ezihlanganiswa  nokuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi mpondo zobhejane kuhlo mulisa amaqembu amancane emigulukudu.
“La maqembu emigulukudu ahlomula ngenxa yokuba yinkimbinkimbi kwalolu hlo-bo lobugebengu. Ngesikhathi amaqembu emigulukudu ehlo-mula, kuthikamezeka ukukwa-zi kukahulumeni ukuqinisekisa kwezenhlalo kanye nomnotho ngenxa yokuthi amaqembu obugebengu obuhleliwe kanye nokusebenza kwawo kuba mandla emiphakathini esezweni lonke,” kuqinisekisa uMnyango.

title: Ukubhalisela ukuvota kuzoba  ngoNdasa wezi-2018
author: More Matshedisoi
text:
Isikhulu Sokhetho Esiyinhloko sekhomishana uSy Mamabolo uthe zonke izikhungo zokuvota eziyizi-22 612 zizovula ngempe-lasonto yangomhla ziyi-10 kanye namhla ziyi-11 kuNdasa wezi-2018, kusukela ngele-8 ekuseni kuze kube ngele-5 ntambama, ukuze kwenziwe kube lula futhi kusize abavoti ukuthi bafake imininingwane yabo yakamuva yokubhalisa noma ukuthi ba bhalise.
Uma uthuthele endaweni entsha kusukela mhla ugcina ukubha lisela ukuvota, kumele ubhalise esifundeni sakho sokuvota esisha.
Izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika ezineminyaka yobudala eyi-16 kanye nangaphezu-lu ezinomazisi noma ikhadi elisemthethweni zingabhalisela ukuvota. Uma ungabhalisanga, angeke uze uvunyelwe ukuthi uvote ngowezi-2019.
Abavoti ababhalisiwe, abanemininingwane yabo yekheli engekho ohlwini lwabavoti, bangahlinze-ka imininingwane edingekayo esikhungweni sabo sokuvota ngesikhathi sokubhalisa.
“Sidinga ukuthi abavoti bafike futhi basebenzise ithuba,” kusho uMamabolo.
“Ikhomishani Yokhetho Ezimele ayikabi namakheli abavoti cishe abayizigidi eziyi-2.8. ngaphezu kwalokho sinamakheli ayizigidi eziyi-3.5 abekwe kuhlu ‘lwa ngaphelele’ noma ‘angacacile’. Lo mkhakha usadinga ukuhlaziywa futhi ukuze kutholakale ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini eminye imininingwane etholakalayo,” kwengeza yena.
Ikhomishani ithola amakheli ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo ezahlu-kene, ezihlanganisa ukubukeza amarekhodi, amafayela kanye nezinqolobane zemibhalo uku-ze ibheke bese ifaka amakheli ahlinzekwe abavoti eminyakeni engama-20 edlule, ngokuqoqa amakheli ngokhetho lomasipala lowezi-2016, kanye nokwenza umsebenzi wokufuna bukhoma kungekafiki impelasonto yoku bhalisela ukhetho lokuchibiyela.
Lapho kwakunesidingo khona, abavoti abatholakale bebhaliswe ezifundeni zokuvota ezingafanele basuswa, njengalokho kuhlinze-kwe kuSigaba 12 (1)(d) Somthetho Wokhetho.
“Sesithole futhi sasebenzisa, lapho bekwenzeka khona, imi-niningwane yamakheli kwemi-nye imithombo yombuso efana ne-Statistics South Africa, i-South African Social Security Agency, u-Telkom, i-South African Post Office kanye noMnyango Wezase-khaya,” kusho yena.Bhalisa ngaphambi kukaNdasa wezi-2018 •	NgoMfumfu	wezi-2017	Ikhomishani 	Yokhetho	Ezimele	yethula	isizindalwazi 	(www.elections.org.za)	kubavoti 	ababhalisiwe	abakwazi	ukufinyelela	kuinthanethi	ukuze	babukeze	bese/noma 	bahlinzeke	ngamakheli	abo.

title: I-MISA iwuhlelo elasiza umhleli womumo wedolobha
author: More Matshediso
text:
UMukhodiwa, odabuka esigodini saseLuheni kuMasipala Wasekhaya iThulame la eLimpopo, uthole Iziqu ze-Urban and Regional Pla nning eNyuvesi yaseVenda ngowezi-2016.
Ungomunye wabahlomule Ohlelweni Lokweseka Ingqa lasizinga Kamasipala Lwa bantu Abasha Abathweswe Iziqu (i-MISA), oluhlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abathweswe iziqu ezingeni lemfudo ephakeme bakwazi ukungena emsebenzini babone okwenziwayo futhi bacathuliswe emsebenzini emikhakheni yezobuchwe pheshe ukuze bakwazi uku bhaliswa njengochwepheshe.
I-MISA iwuhlaka lukahu lumeni kazwelonke olu ngaphansi koMnyango Wo kwengamela Ngokubambi sana. Yasungulwa kuNhlaba 2012.
"Emuva kokuqeda umatikuletsheni ngowezi-2008, kwaba nesidingo sokuthi ngithathe ikhefu lonyaka ukuze  ngithole indlela yokukhokha izindleko zasenyuvesi," ku sho uMukhodiwa.
Ngowezi-2010, wabhalisa eNyuvesi yaseGoli kodwa akabanga nemali eyanele ukuthi aqede unyaka wakhe wokuqala, kwase kuphoqele ka ukuthi ashiye phansi.
Ngonyaka olandelayo, wa bhalisela izifundo zobunjini yela, i-Electrical Engineering  N3 ekolishi langakubo kepha washesha ukubona ukuthi bengadalelwanga lezo zifu ndo. Waphinda futhi wathu mela izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi ethemba ukuthi uzothola uxhaso.
Ngenhlanhla, iNyuvesi yaseVenda yasamukela isicelo sakhe, waqala ukufundela Iziqu ze-Urban and Regional Planning ngowezi-2012.
"Uhlelo Lokuxhasa Abafu ndi Ngezimali Kuzwelonke (i-NSFAS) lwakhokhela izifundo zami zonyaka wokuqala, i-MISA yangipha umfundaze sengisonyanke ni wesibili futhi yangeseka ngaze ngaqeda izifundo zami ngowezi-2016," kusho yena.
Umfundaze wahlangabezana nazo zonke izidingo zakhe zemfundo, okubandakanya imali yezifundo, izincwadi, indawo yokuhlala kanye nokudla.
Ngowezi-2017 uMukhodiwa waqala uhlelo lokuqashwa okwesikhashana ngenhloso yokufundiswa umsebe nzi kuMasipala Wasekhaya  iPrince Albert eMnyangweni Wezemisebenzi Yokwesekwa Komnyango kanye Nompha kathi.
"Ungafinyelela lapho ofu na ukuya khona noma ku nini. Kumele wenze konke okusemandleni ukushintsha izimo zakho futhi uthuthu kise izimo ophila ngaphansi kwazo," kusho uMukhodiwa.
Uhlelo Lwabantu Abasha Abathweswe Iziqu i-MISA lunabathweswe iziqu abangama-70, okubandaka nya abahleli bomumo wama dolobha nezifunda abanga ma-31, onjiniyela obuqodene nogesi abangama-24, onjiniyela abaqondene nezokudwe ba, ukwakha nokulungisa okwakhiwe abayi-12 kanye nabaphathi bamaphrojekthi nezinkontileka abathathu.
Bonke basingethwe omasipala kuzo zonke izifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye nje ngengxenye yohlelo.
Isikhulu Esiphezulu (i-CEO) Esiyibamba se-MISA uNta ndazo Vimba uthe ihhovisi lakhe liyaqonda ukuthi iNi ngizimu Afrika idinga kakhu lu abantu abanamakhono obunjiniyela nezokwakha.  “Asifuni abantu abasha abaneziqu kule mikhakha kuphela, kodwa kumele siqinisekise ukuthi baqeqe shwe ngendlela esezingeni lomhlaba futhi bangochwe pheshe ababhalisiwe,” kusho uVimba.
"Omasipala bethu baba dinga kakhulu ochwepheshe. Sinomthwalo omkhulu wo kwenza uhulumeni wase khaya ube nochwepheshe, ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zethu zokuvukuza ama khono," esho engezela. 


Abazali bazobamba iqhaza okhethweni lwe-SGB

ABAZAlI BANEthuBA lokubamba iqhaza lobuholi ekulawulweni kokuphathwa kwezikole zikahulumeni ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa isimo kanye nokwenza isikole sabantwana babo sibe indawo engcono.

ukhetho lwesigungu esilawulwa uku phathwa kwesikole (i-SGB) lubanjwa kuNdasa futhi abazali banxuswa ukuthi bazibandakanye ukuze ba bambe iqhaza elibonakalayo emfundweni yezingane zabo.
Ukhetho luzobanjwa kuzo zonke izikole zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.
UNgqongqoshe Weze mfundo Eyisisekelo u-Angie Motshekga uthe le yinqubo yokhetho enkulukazi ezweni, engaphandle kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya kanye no hulumeni kazwelonke.
"Ukhetho lwe-SGB lunegale lo ekutheni umphakathi uzi zwele ingumnikazi wendawo yawo. Imiphumela yesikole ivame ukuba ngcono lapho abazali bezibandakanya  ngokugcwele futhi benentshi sekelo ezindabeni zesikole.”Ama-SGB anendima enku lu okumele ayidlale eku qinisekiseni ukuthi izidingo zabo bonke ababambiqhaza ziyahambelana, ngenhloso yokufezekisa injongo efanayo yokuzuza imiphumela yezemfundo emihle, ezo kwazi ukubhekelela izidi ngo zomphakathi kanye ne ntuthuko yezomnotho.
I-SGB imele zonke izinhla ka zomphakathi wesikole, okubandakanya abazali,  othisha, abasebenzi aba ngafundisi kanye nabafu ndi. Isikhathi sokusebenza kwamalungu e-SGB siyimi nyaka emithathu.
Amandla okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole UMthetho Wezikole zaseNingi zimu Afrika unika i-SGB amandla alingene okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole nje ngengxenye yezinhlaka zenta ndo yeningi labantu ezibalule kile.
Ngokubamba iqhaza enqu bweni yokhetho, abazali ba -qinisekisa ukuthi isikole senza lokhu okuphumelelisa intshisekelo yezingane zabo ngendlela ephuma phambili.
Yize amalungu e-SGB kungadingeki ukuthi abe neziqu ze mfundo, abazali abanamakhono okugcina amabhuku, ukuba la imali kanye nemisebenzi yezomthetho kanye nalabo abanentshisekelo, nabanotha ndo lwezemfundo banxuswa ukuthi bacabange ngokungenela ukhetho.
