title: Ihubo lesizwe, iflegi, izindodo zesizwe, isiphandla sesizwe kanye nezimpawu zezwe kugubha ukwehlukahlukana
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-Vuk’uzenzele ibheka ukubaluleka kwalolu suku nokuthi luchaza ukuthini kithina bantu baseNingizimu Afrika.
Mhla zingama-27 kuMbasa ngowe-1994 iNingizimu  Afrika yaba nokhetho lokuqa la lwentando yeningi laba ntu olungacwasi ngokwebala. Kwakhethwa uhulumeni omusha owawuholwa uMongameli ongasekho uNelson Mandela. Kuningi osekuzuziwe eminya keni edlule, kodwa kuningi oku sadinga ukuthi kwenziwe ukuze kwenziwe ngcono izwe lethu futhi kuguqulwe nezimpilo zabo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika.  Le nyanga kaMbasa akuyona kuphela eyokuthi sibheke ukuthi sesizuzeni njengezwe, ko dwa yisikhathi futhi lapho iNi ngizimu Afrika igubha khona amaqhawe kanye namaqhawekazi ayo ngokuwanikeza Izi ndondo Zezwe. Lokhu ukuklo nyeliswa ngezindondo okusez ingeni eliphezulu kakhulu izwe, ngoMongameli walo, elikwazi ukuziklomelisa izakhamuzi zalo kanye nabahlonishwa abavela emazweni angaphandle.UMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika UMthethosisekelo wabhalwa ngokuphathelene Nesigaba 5 soMthethosisekelo wesikhashana (uMthetho 200 we-1993) futhi wemukelwa okokuqala Yisigu ngu soMthethosisekelo mhla ziyi-8 kuNhlaba 1996. Wasayinwa waba ngumthetho mhla ziyi-10 kuZi bandlela 1996.
Izimpawu zethu zezwe  INingizimu Afrika ihlukile ngenxa yokuthi siyakwazi ukugubha ukwehlukahluka kwethu ngezi mpawu zezwe kanye neflegi lesi zwe, ihubo lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika kanye nesiphandla sesizwe.
Iflegi laseNingizimu Afrika lihlukile. Ladizayinwa i-State He rald saseNingizimu Afrika, uFred Brownell, futhi laqalwa ukuse tshenziswa ngomhla zingama-27 kuMbasa we-1994.
Imibala yeflegi ayinancazelo ethile ngakho-ke akukho ngqikithi jikelele okumele iyamaniswe nemibala yeflegi.
U-‘V’ eflegini ukhombisa uku hlangana kwabantu abahlukene baseNingizimu Afrika kanye nokuthatha indlela ephambi kwethu ndawonye ngobunye.
Ukundizisa iflegi Uma iflegi limiswa liqondane nodonga, indawo ebomvu kumele ibe kwesokunxele solibukayo bese umphetho wentambo ube ngaphezulu. Uma limiswe lavundla, umphetho wentambo kumele ube kwesokunxele solibukayo bese u mbala obomvu uba phezulu. Uma iflegi libekwe eduze noma ngemva kwesikhulumi emhla nganweni, kumele libe kwesokudla sesikhulumi. Uma libekwe kwenye indawo endaweni okuhlanganye lwe kuyo kumele libekwe kwe sokudla sezethameli.
Isiphandla Sezwe Isiphandlwa sezwe, siphinde sazi we ngokuthi uphawu lombuso, si wuphawu lombuso olubonakalayo olusezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu.
Isiphandla sezwe siyingxe nye esemqoka yophawu le zwe olukhulu. Incwadi eno mnyatheliso wophawu olukhulu inegunya eliphelele ngoba igu nyazwe uMongameli waseNi ngizimu Afrika.
Isiphandla sezwe sethulwa Ngosuku Lwenkululeko ngowe zi-2000. Izinto ezikuso zihlelwe ngendlela ekhombisa ukuzinza kanye nenhlonipho.
Isiqubulo sesiphandla sezwe, “!ke e: /xarra //ke ” esibhalwe ngolimi lwamaKhoisan, sichaza ukuthi abantu abehlukene ababumbane.
Ihubo Lesizwe Ihubo lethu Lesizwe lihlukile futhi liculwa ngezilimi ezine.
Ihubo Lesizwe limenyezelwe ngowe-1997. Isihumusho esi fushane, esihlanganisiwe sama hubo esizwe amabili (u-‘Nkosi Sikelel’ iAfrika’ ne-‘The Call of South Africa’/’Die Stem van Suid-Afrika’); elaculwa phakathi kowe-1994 nowe-1997.Izimpawu zethu zezwe yilezi ezilandelayo:
•	 Isilwane	sesizwe,	insephe
•	 Imbali	yesizwe,	isiqalaba	esikhulu
•	 Isihlahla	sesizwe,	umkhoba
•	 Inyoni	yesizwe,	indwa
•	 Inhlanzi	yesizwe,	inhlanzi	yehlalijuni

title: I-App Yezokuthutha eGauteng
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-Gauteng on the Move wu hlelo oluqeda ungabazane nokudideka okuhambisana nokusetshenziswa kwezithuthi zomphakathi, njengoba luni keza umphakathi imininingwa ne eqondile futhi esheshayo mayelana nezikhathi zokuha mba kwezithuthi zomphakathi kanye nezindleko ze-Gautrain, Metrobus, A Re Yeng, Rea Vaya, Metrorail, amabhasi e-Gautrain, amabhasi e-Johannesburg City Sightseeing, amabhasi kama sipala waseTshwane kanye namatekisi.
Ekhuluma ngesikhathi kwe thulwa lolu hlelo-kusebenza emahhovisi abasunguli balo e-Midrand, u-MEC wezoku Thutha e-Gauteng u-Ismail Vadi uthe umnyango uyasibona isidingo sezobuchwepheshe no hlelo oluphusile kwezokuthutha oluzobamba iqhaza ekuthuthu kisweni kohlelo lwezokuthutha.
“UHulumeni Wesifunda zwe sase-Gauteng unikele ngesikhathi, imizamo nezi nsiza ukuthuthukisa lolu hlelo lwezokuthutha olusiza umpha kathi ukwazi ukuxhumana kalula nezinhlobo zokuthu thwa komphakathi ezahlukene esifundazweni.”"Sesiqalile ukubona amandla ezobuchwepheshe eguqula isimo sezinsizakalo zokuthu thwa komphakathi. Akukho ukungabaza ukuthi ushintsho lwezobuchwepheshe emhlabe ni jikelele seluqalise uguquko olukhulukazi emkhakheni we zokuthutha, futhi nathi kumele siguquke ukuze sihambisane nalezi zinguquko,” kusho yena.
U-Vadi uqinisekisile ukuthi isifundazwe sizoqhubeka noku sebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, ucwaningo nentuthuko ukuthuthukisa isifundazwe esisebenzisa ezobu chwepheshe esizophucula futhi senze kube lula ukufinyelela kwezokuthutha.
Uma ‘seludawunilodiwe’ lolu hlelo-kusebenza, luzobasiza abalusebenzisayo ukuhlela uhambo lwabo ngokuthi bakhethe uhlobo lwezoku thutha abaludingayo, izikhathi zokuhamba nokunye, njengo kuqoka uhambo olufushane nolusheshayo futhi olungambi eqolo.
Umfundi waseGoli u-Glen Dlamini uthe lolu hlelo-kuse benza luzoletha isisombululo kubagibeli abayizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane.
“Lolu wuhlelo-kusebe nza olumangazayo impela.
Luwuhlelo oluhle kakhulu oluqaliswe nguhulumeni futhi akungabazeki nakancane uku thi luzosiguqula isimo sezinto, ikakhulukazi kubantu abasha njengami abagibela izithuthi zomphakathi nsuku zonke besuka eSoweto belibangise eNyuvesi yaseGoli e-Auckland Park.”“Okungenani manje sengiya kwazi ukuhlela uhambo lwami kangcono, ngokwemali engi -nayo, futhi ngenze nesilinganiso sezikhathi zokuhamba ngize ngifike lapho ngiphokophele khona.”“Ngicabanga ukuthi lolu wu hlelo-kusebenza olumangazayo impela futhi njengomuntu ongeyena owokudabuka ku lesi sifundazwe, luzongisiza kakhulu uma kufanele ngiha mbe ngezithuthi zomphakathi,” kusho uKhanyo Malunga, ngesikhathi ekhuluma no Vuk’uzenzele e-Blairgowrie.
“Uma ngize lapha ngizokwe nza inhlolokhono, ngizokwazi ukuhlela kangcono futhi ngazi nendlela yami kanye nokuthi ngiyaphi,” kwengeza yena.
Lolu hlelo-kusebenza lutho lakala kumadivayisi e-Android nama-iPhone, ezitolo ezihluka hlukene zezinhle lo-kusebenza zokuxhumana .

title: Ukulwisana nesomiso esikhulu
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Isomiso siyisikhathi eside lapho izimvula ziyivela kancane, okwenza kuntuleke amanzi.
Ngokusho kukaDkt Mathieu Roualt, ongusolwazi eNyuvesi yaseKapa eMnyangweni Wezi fundo Eziphathelene Nolwandle i-Oceanography, uthi okuyiyona mbangela yesomiso wumthelela we-El Niño nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.
“I-El Niño yisikhathi esizifike la ngokwemvelo njalo emva kweminyaka emithathu kuya kwemihlanu, futhi singaqhube ka kuze kuphele iminyaka emi bili. Sinyusa amazinga okushisa nokubanda olwandle i-Pacific ne-Indian, okuyinto engadala isomiso,” ngokusho kwakhe.
Ukuguquguquka kwesimo se zulu kuchazwa njengoshintsho esimweni sezulu somhlaba jike lele noma ezifundeni, okwaqala maphakathi nenyaka-khulu lama-20 kuya ngasekupheleni kwalo futhi lokhu kungumphu mela wokuphakama kwamazi nga esikhutha emkhathini okubangelwa wukusetshenzi swa kwezibaseli.
“Kuleli nyaka-khulu eledlule isifunda esiseningizimu ne Afrika sikhahlanyezwe wukuguquguquka  kwesimo sezulu unyaka nonyaka, okuholele eso misweni esinamandla esesiphazamise impilo yezinto eziphila emhla beni nasolwandle kanye nempilo yabantu.  Lolu guquko lunomthelela ongemuhle kwezolimo, imithombo yamanzi nakwezokudoba futhi kanjalo nasemnothweni wonkana. Kuphinde kube nomthelela ongemuhle ekugelezeni kwemifudlana nezakhi-mpilo ezingena olwa ndle,” kuchaza uDkt Roualt.
Lo mthelela uzwela kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika ngoba izwe lethu libhekene nokuntuleka kwezimvula, esezehle nga mamililitha (ml) angama-450 ngonyaka, uma kuqhathaniswa nesilinganiso somhlaba esinga ma-860 ml.
Uyini umthelela wesomiso?NgoNhlolanja, uMnyango We -zokusebenzisana Kohulumeni kanye Nezindaba Zendabuko (i-COGTA) ukhuphule izinga lenhlekelele yesomiso lisuka kwelenhlekelele yesifundazwe walibeka ezingeni lenhlekelele kazwelonke.
“Ngemuva kokucubungula kabusha izinga nobukhulu balesi somiso esiqhubekayo esesihlasele okungenani izifu ndazwe ezintathu, abenga mele izinhlekelele babeke lesi somiso esigabeni senhlekelele kazwelonke,” ngokusho kwenhloko yesiKhungo Esengamele Izinhlekelele Zikazwelonke, uDkt Mmaphaka Tau.
Nakuba kusenzima uku wukala umthelela wesomiso kwezomnotho, sekube nomkhu lu umthelela emkhakheni wezolimo. ENtshonalanga Kapa, okuyisifundazwe sesibili ngobukhulu esifaka isandla emkhiqizweni ophelele wezwe ohlangothini lwezolimo, ilinga niselwa ezi-21 000 imisebenzi elahlekile ngekota yesithathu yonyaka odlule. Umkhiqizo kakolweni wehle ngamaphese nti angama-47 ngowezi-2017 fu thi kuzoba nokushoda okunga malitha ayizigidi ezingama-90 ewayini kumkhiqizo othengiswa emazweni angaphandle kanye nangaphakathi kuleli.
Ukushoda kwamanzi kuzoba nomthelela ongemuhle kwezo kuthuthwa kwendle, ezempilo nezokuvakasha.
Yini eyenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nalesi simo?Omasipala abakhungethwe yisomiso sebeqalise uhlelo lwezi nyathelo eziqinile zokusetshe nziswa kwamanzi oluqondiswe ezakhamuzini namabhizinisi.
Izikhungo zokuhlanza amanzi olwandle ukuze asetshenziswe ngabantu emakhaya nasema bhizinisini, izinhlelo zokulungi swa kwamapayipi, ukusetshenzi swa kabusha kwamanzi kanye nohlelo lokumbiwa kwamanzi emhlabathini sekuhlonzwe njengesisombululo kule nkinga, njengoba lemi klamo seyisezi gabeni ezihlukahlukene nga phambi kokuba iphothulwe.

title: Intsha iyalisekela uhlelo lwe-YES
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-YES, esanda kwethulwa nguMongameli Cyril Rama phosa, ihlose ukulungiselela abantu abasha umsebenzi kanye nokubahlinzeka nga makhono emicikilisho edinge kayo ukuze kwakhiwe umno tho othuthukisa izimboni.
UTemane uyachaza ukuthi emva kokuphothula iziqu zakhe ngowezi-2016 akakwa zanga ukufaka izicelo zomse benzi ngoba wayengenaso isi piliyoni somsebenzi esifanele.
“Kwakulukhuni kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi ngapha ndle kwesipiliyoni. Nge nhlanhla ngenkathi ngi hlangana nabakwa-Lulaway Recruitment Agency abase -benzisana nohlelo lwe-YES, banginikeza ithuba lokuthola isipiliyoni emsebenzini.”Uhlelo lwe-YES umzamo ohlanganyelwe kahulumeni, abasebenzi kanye nabama bhizinisi ukuze bahlinze ke ngamathuba esipiliyoni somsebenzi akhokhelwayo entsheni yaseNingizimu Afrika eyisigidi kulesi sikha thi seminyaka emithathu ezayo.
Ucwaningo oluqhutshiwe ngababambiqhaza luveza ukuthi unyaka nje owodwa  wesipiliyoni somsebenzi kuCV , nencwadi ewubufakazi ngamakhono nolwazi lomu ntu (i-reference letter), kwenyu sa amathuba okuthola komu ntu umsebenzi ngokuphindwe kathathu.
UTemane wengeze ngoku thi uyawuthanda umsebenzi wakhe, ikakhulukazi ngoba uphinde athole ithuba loku siza abantu abasha ukuze bathole imisebenzi njengo -ba phela enza umsebenzi njengemfundamakhwela eqa sha abantu.
Ekwethulweni kohlelo lweYES uMongameli Ramapho sa waboniswa abantu abasha bokuqala abayi-100 abazoqa shwa ngalolu hlelo ngaba kwa-ABSA, Investec, Netcare, Sasol nabakwa-Unilever.
“Sibona leli cebo njenge nsika eyodwa ewumzamo ka zwelonke obanzi nodidiyelwe ukuze kudalwe amathuba kubantu abasha. Enye insi ka ukuthuthukiswa kwama khono nolwazi lwabantu abasha,” kusho uMongameli Ramaphosa.
Ucele abamabhizinisi ase mancane ukuba nabo badlale eyabo indima njengoba bena bantu abaningi ababaqashayo waphinde wathi amabhizinisi amakhulu akakwazi ukumu matha intsha eyanele wodwa.
Ngokusho kweSikhulu esi Phethe (i-CEO) i-YES uTa shmia Ismail-Saville, phaka thi kwabantu abayizigidi ezi li-15.5 eNingizimu Afrika  abaneminyaka ephakathi kwe yi-18 nengama-34, abayizigidi eziyi-5.8 abasebenzi.
“Uhlelo lwe-YES luhlose ukunikeza leyo ngxenye ya bantu abasha baleli, abanga nakwa kakhulu yimigomo yamanje yokuqasha ezweni, ithuba lokuqala elibalulekile lokuzuza isipiliyoni somse benzi weqophelo eliphezulu, okhokhelwayo,” kusho u-I smail-Saville.
Umhuhiso owengeziwe  kwabamabhizinisi asemanca ne, labo abaqasha abantu abasha abaneminyaka yobu dala ephakathi kweyi-18 kuya kwengama-29, bazofaneleka Izaphulelo Zentela Zokuqa sha ezilingana ne-R1 000 nge nyanga.
Abantu abasha bohlelo lweYES kufanele babe:
• Neminyaka yobudala ephakathi kweyi-18nengama-34.• Ukuthi bebangasebe nzi isikhathi sezinyanga eziyisithupha.
• Abantu abamnyama  (Owomdabu, Oyikhala di noma oyiNdiya).
• Uma kwenzeka izi nkampani zifuna uku faka isicelo seSaphule lo Sentela Sokuqasha, intsha kufanele kube ineminyaka yobuda la ephakathi kweyi-18 nengama-29.
Ingabe izohola malini le ntsha?Umholo kulindeleke uku thi ulingane nezinga leholo eliphansi likazwelonke lezi3 500 zamarandi ngenyanga, okubandakanya ukuqeqe shwa nokwesekwa oku zohlinzekwa. Izindleko e zilinganiselwe ngonyaka yizi 55 000 zamarandi.

title: INingizimu Afrika kungenzeka ibe nolimi olusemthethweni olusha
author: Neo Semono
text:
UMongameli Cyril Rama phosa wenze lesi simemezelo ngesikhathi sokugcotshwa  kweNdlovukazi yesizwe saBalobedu eNkundleni yezemidlalo iMokwakwai la eBolobedu, eGa-Modjadji eLimpopo.
IKhelobedu ulimi olukhu lunywa uhlanga lwaBa lobedu iNdlovukazi  Yemvula yaBalobedu ene minyaka eyi-13, uMasalana bo Modjadji, ezobabusa lapho isineminyaka eyi-18, emva kokubekwa njengeNdlo vukazi Modjadji wesi-VII.
Uzothweswa iziqu nje ngokwezinqubo namasiko aBalobedu.
“Le yinqubekelapha mbili eyingqophamlando wangempela uMama Wi nnie Madikizela-Mandela obengaziqhenya ngawo.
Lesi yisihlalo seNdlovuka zi sokuqala nokuwukuphela kwaso ezweni nasezwenika zi lonkana,” kusho uMonga meli Ramaphosa.
UMongameli Ramaphosa uphinde waqinisekisa uku zibophezela kukahulumeni ekubuyiselweni kwesithu nzi nenhlonipho kubaholi bendabuko.
Isihlalo seNdlovukazi ya Balobedu saqala ukwaziwa ngokusemthethweni ngoNda sa wezi-2016 emva kokuba iKhomishani Yezicelo Nezi ngxabano Zobuholi Benda buko (i-CTLDC) iqhube ucwaningo odabeni lwaBa lobedu, njengokwezicelo ezalethwa phambi kwe-CT LDC.
“Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuphumeleliseni imibande la yeSahluko 12 soMthetho sisekelo, ikakhulukazi  ukubuyiselwa kwesithu nzi sobuholi bendabu ko bonkana entandweni yeningi labantu ehambisana noMthethosisekelo,” kusho uMongameli Ramaphosa.
Uthe ukwaziswa kwesi hlalo seziNdlovukazi eNi ngizimu Afrika kukho mbisa ukuzibopheze la emgomweni nokwa ziswa kokuphathwa  ngokulingana kobulili  bonke, ngale nkathi kube kwaziswa nendima yobu holi edlalwa ngabesifazane kuzo zonke izingxenye ze mpilo.
“Abaholi bendabuko  banendima ebalulekile  okufanele bayidlale uku -ze kwakhiwe izwe eli ngenabubha, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi nokuphathwa kwabantu ngokulinganayo.
Abaholi bethu bendabuko badinga ukuba phambili kulo mzabalazo wokubu yisela amalungelo nesithu nzi kubantu bethu.”Uqhubeke wagcizelela ukubaluleka kwendima e dlalwa ngabaholi bendabu ko ekubuyiseleni umhlaba kubanikazi abafanele.
“Badinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umhlaba ubuyise lwa kulabo abawuse benzayo kanye nokuthi labo umhlaba obuyise lwe kubona banezindlela zokuwusebenza,” kusho  uMongameli Ramaphosa.
Balinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama-25 abantu abahla la ezindaweni zasemakhaya ababuswa ngabaholi benda buko. 


Ingabe bewazi?
• Isizwe saBalobedu sathinteka lapho ngonyaka we-1972 owayeyiNdlovukazi Yemvula ngaleso sikhathi iNdlovukazi Makoma Modjadji ephucwa amandla akhe nesikhundla wehliselwa ekubeni yinduna nje.
• Izigodi nezinduna ngaphansi kokubusa kwakhe zadidiyelwa zafakwa ezindaweni zaseLebowa naseGazankulu nokwaholela ekutheni kubhidlizwe amasiko anothile omlando wendlovukazi osukela eminyakeni engama-400 edlule.

title: UMnyango Wezasekhaya Umemezela Ukulwisana Nemigqa Emide
author: More Matshediso
text:
NgokukaNgqongqoshe Wo mnyango Wezasekhaya uMalusi Gigaba imigqa emide ibibangelwa inani eliphezulu labantu abadinga usizo, isikhala esinganele ema hhovisi oMnyango, izinkinga eziphathelene nobuholi kanye nokuvalwa kwamahhovisi awo ngeMigqibelo.
Ukuze kulungiswe inkinga,  umnyango ubukeza umthelela ngokwezendawo ukuze kuhlonzwe izindawo lapho udinga khona ukwenza ngcono izinsiza zawo.  “Sizogunyaza inhlolovo yokwe neliseka kwezakhamuzi, senze ukuthi isikhungo sokuxhu mana nezakhamuzi sisebenze ngokwezinga eliphezulu, sizothola isisombululo ngokuphathelene nabantu abeza esikhungweni abayinani elingaqageleki kanye nesikhala emahhovisi omnya ngo, ukubheka okungenzeka ngokuphathelene nohlelo olusha lwamashifu, ukulungisa uhle loxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza, ukwenyu swa kokuvakasha kwabaphathi abasezikhundleni eziphezulu emahhovisi ethu, ukuthuthu kiswa kokwenziwa komsebenzi kanye nokwenziwa ngcono kokuxoxisana nezakhamuzi,” kuqinisekisa uNgqongqoshe.
Lezi zinhlelo zokuzokwenziwa zizokwethulwa njengezindlela zokungenelela zesikhashana, zesikhathi esiphakathi nendawo kanye nezesikhathi eside.
UNgqongqoshe uchaze lezi zi ngqinamba ezingeke zisonjululwe ngokungenelela okusheshayo futhi wacela umphakathi ukuthi ube nesineke ngesikhathi umnya ngo wethula lokhu.  “Simile sizibophezela ekwenzeni okusemandleni ethu ukuze si nqobe ukulwisana nemigqa, nangaphandle kwezingqina mba kanye nezinye izi nselele,” kusho uNgqongqoshe uGigaba.
Ngaphambi kokuthi umemezele izinhlelo zozokwenza umnyango wenza umbiko wokuhlola ukuze uthole ukuthi ungakwazi kanjani ukulwisana nemigqa futhi wenze ngcono izinsiza zawo.
Umbiko wabeka uhleloxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza njengalo kho kulindelekile, uhlelo lokwe nziwa komsebenzi olungasebenzi ngendlela efanele kanye nezindlela zokuxhumana ezingahlanga nisiwe ngendlela efanele eziholela kwizakhamuzi ezingenelisekile kanye nemigqa emide.
NgokukaNgqongqoshe, lezi zinto ezilandelayo zenza inkinga ibe yimbi kakhulu: 
■ Ukungengameli ngendlela efanele kwamanye amahhovisi ■ Ukungasetshenziswa ngendlela efanele kwabasebenzi. 
■ Ukungabikho kohlelo loku bhuka ukubonwa komuntu othile.  ■ Ukungenganyelwa ngendlela esebenzayo kwemigqa.  
■ Ukusebenza ngesikhathi esi sodwa kwezinhlelo zokwe nziwa mathupha kanye nokwe nziwa ngemishini.
■ Ukungasabalaliswa ngokuli nganayo kwamahhovisi ngo kusekela ezibalweni zabantu.
■ Ukukhishwa kwemibiko enge yona ngokuphathelene  nokuqedwa komazisi abalu hlaza abanamagabelo.  • Ukungabi sezingeni kwezi mpawu ezikhombisa okuthile emahhovisi.
Kukhona amahhovisi Omnya ngo Wezasekhaya angama-184 kuphela akwazi ukuthwebula noma ukuthatha izithombe kanye nezikhungo ezihlinzeka ngezinye izinsiza ezingama-411 ezweni lonkana.
Amahhovisi ayi-184 kuphela alungiselela izicelo kanye nokulandwa kwamakhadi angomazisi kanye namaphasipoti.  Umnyango ulungisa kabusha amahhovisi angomahamba ne ndlwana angama-78 futhi uqinisekile ukuthi azohanjiswa kuyo yonke iNingizimu Afrika ngesigamu sesibili sowezi-2018.

NGABE BEWAZI?
Kusukela mhla kuqala ukukhishwa kwamakhadi angomazisi ngowezi-2013, amahhovisi oMnyango Wezasekhaya asekhiphe amakhadi evile ezigidini eziyisishiyagalolunye.

title: Isibophezelo seNingizimu Afrika sokufundisa intsha
author: More Matshediso
text:
UNgqongqoshe uPandor uthe kuyisibophezelo sezwe ukweseka imindeni empofu kanye nesengcupheni kakhulu.
Wayekhuluma ngesikhathi sesithangami sabezindaba lapho aveza khona inqubo yo kwethula imfundo ephakeme yamahhala eNingizimu Afrika.
UNgqongqoshe uPandor ume -mezela ukuthi uhulumeni usetshale izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi-7. 166 ukuze ukho khele imifundaze yezingane ezivela emindenini empofu kanye nezasemindenini ena bondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezi ngena emanyuvesi kanye naku makolishi e-TVET kulo nyaka.
Ungqongqoshe uPandor uqinisekisile ukuthi sekubekwe eceleni izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi ezingama-4.581 kwenzelwa izitshudeni ezikwaze ukungena emanyuvesi kanye nezigidi zezigidi zamarandi eziyi-2.585 zezitshudeni zakumakolishi e-TVET.
Ngowezi-2017 uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi imfundo ephakeme izoba mahhala kuzi tshudeni ezimpofu kanye na lezo ezivela emindenini ethola umholo wonyaka ohlangene ngaphambi kwezimali eziba njwayo engaze ifinyelele kwi -zi-350 000 zamarandi.
Izitshudeni zesekwa ngesi kimu semifundaze esibanzi, esingena esikhundleni sesi kimu esedlule esasinengxenye eyimalimboleko kanye nengu mfundaze esasihlinzekwa iSi khwama Sikwazwelonke Sokusiza Abafundi Ngezimali (i-NSFAS). “Ukuhlinzekwa okusisekelo kwe-NSFAS kokuxhasa izitshudeni ezivela emindenini empofu kanye naleyo ihola amaholo aphansi ezingena emanyuvesi kanye nakumako lishi e-TVET kuzokhuphuka ku suka ezigidini zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi-9.849 ngowe zi-2017/18 ukuya ezigidini zezigidi zamarandi ezinga ma-35.321 ngowezi-2020/21.
“Lokhu kuchaza isidingo zokwenza ngcono ukwenziwa komsebenzi kanye noku thuthukisa izinhlelo ze-NSFAS.
Ngakho-ke sihlinzeke ezinye izigidi zamarandi eziyi-105 Kuhlaka Lokusebenzisa Ima li Lwesikhathi Esiphakathi Nendawo ukuze kusizwe  i-NSFAS ukuthi yandise futhi iqinise ukwazi kwayo ukwe ngamela,” kusho uNgqo ngqoshe.  Izitshudeni okumele zihlo mule, kuyo yonke iminyaka yokufunda, ezibhalise ema kholishi e-TVET zizothola umfundaze ozokhokhela imali yokufunda kanye nezinsiza zokufunda.
Ukukhushulwa kwemali ehli nzekwayo ngowezi-2018/19 kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi izitshudeni ezingama-458 875 zithola imifundaze.
Kukhona cishe izitshudeni  ezingama-50 480 zakumakolishi e-TVET, ezitholakele zifanele ukuthola imali yokugibela, inda wo yokuhlala kanye nokudla, nazo ezizoxhaswa; ngesikhathi kukhona ezinye ezingama 82 600 ezitholakala zifanele ukuthola imali yokugibela.
UNgqongqoshe uthe kuli ndeleke ukuthi kuhlinzekwe ukuxhaswa ngezimali cishe kwezikhala ezingama-83 200 kwezingama-208 000 (ama40%) ezikhona kubantu aba ngena emanyuvesi ngowe zi-2018 okokuqala.

title: Umlimi wesifazane ophokophele empumelelweni
author: Nonkululeko Mathebula
text:
UMahlatse waqala ukuvo lontiya epulazini lasendaweni elikhiqiza ophepha abaluhlaza njalo ngezimpelasonto noma kuvalwe izikole eneminyaka eyi-15, futhi ezama ukusiza umama wakhe owayengase benzi ukuthi abe nokuya ngasethunjini.
UMatlakane uzinze  e-Ga-Moisimane e-Buchum eduzane nasePolokwane eLimpopo.
Nakuba edla izithelo zomsebenzi wakhe, uthi akukaze kube lula nenze.
“Ngesikhathi ngikhula no dadewethu nabafowethu bekungelula neze. Ontanga bami bebengenza inhlekisa ngesikhathi ngiqala ukuse benza epulazini bethi ipulazi elabantu abangafundile.
“Lokhu kwakungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu kodwa ngangifisa ukuqokelela ulwa zi ngezolimo ukuze ngolunye usuku ngigxile kulo mkha kha,” elandisa.
Kwathi lapho uMatlakane eseqokelele ulwazi, waqonda kumnikazi wepulazi u-Johan Nel, walapho ayevolontiya khona wacela ukutshala imbe wu alime ophepha abaluhlaza.
U-Nel wamabela emhlabeni wakhe umhlaba ongamahekthara amabili.
“Kwangimangaza ukuthi imbewu encane ingashintshaikhiqize ophepha abaluhlaza abakhulu. Ukubona ukuthi izitshalo zinakekelwa kanja ni ngomanyolo ukulwisana nezimbungulu kwangenza ngaba nothando lwezolimo kakhudlwana. Kusukela ngale so sikhathi kwangicacela ukuthi ilokhu engifisa ukukwenza,” ngokusho kukaMatlakane.
Ngemuva kokuphothula umatekuletsheni uMatlakane wahlala ekhaya nakuba iNyuvesi yaseGoli (i-UJ) yabe imamukele ukuba afundele umthetho.
Wabuyela ku-Nel wamcela ukuba amqwashise kabanzi ngezolimo, u-Nel owamtshela ukuba akakhulume nenkosi yendawo ukuze imabele umhlaba.  Emva kokubona inqubekela phambili yakhe esebenza epu lazini lika-Nel, inkosi yendawo yamabela umhlaba ongama hekthara angama-40 epulazini i-Babirwa Ba Tau Ya Tswala okuyilapho esebenzela khona.
Useqashe abantu abasebasha abane asebenzisana nabo.  Ipulazi likaMatlakane likhiqiza ophepha abaluhlaza libathumele ezitolo ezidayisa imikhiqizo yasensimini e-Bu chum, ePolokwane naseGoli.
Nakuba ibhizinisi lakhe lenza inzuzo elinganiselwa kwimali eyizi-50 000 zamarandi ngenyanga, uMatlakane uphokophele ukuthengisela amazwe omhlaba.  Nakuba engakalutholi usizo oluvela kuhulumeni, uMatlakane uphokophelele ikusasa eliqhakazile futhi uthi iphupho lakhe ukusiza abantu aba-hlaselwe ububha emphakathini wangakubo ngokubanika amakhono futhi abaqashe nje-ngoba ibhizinisi lakhe lisaqhu beka likhula.

title: Abaqaphi beziqiwu bavikela obhejane
author: Dale Hes
text:
UNyawo, oyingxenye ya basebenzi abaqaphe ezemvelo ngaphansi kwe-EPWP , ukholelwa ukuthi kusemqo -ka ukufundisa umphakathi ngokunakekela imvelo.
 “Sifisa ukuphuma sifundise umphakathi ukuthi kungani kubalulekile ukunakekela imvelo. Kulapho-ke umphakathi uzoqonda indima yezilwane nezinyamazane zasendle,” ngokusho kukaNyawo.
Lolu hlelo, okuwuhlelo olufundisa intsha yaseNingizimu Afrika amakhono ewadingayo ukuze isebenze emkhakheni wokongiwa kwemvelo, izilwane zasendle nezitshalo, lolu hlelo lusize uNyawo ukuba anakekele umndeni wakhe.
“Umndeni wami usuno phahla olungavuzi, ngoba ngiyasebenza. Kuyangithoko zisa ukuthi ngathola leli thu ba,” kusho uNyawo.
UNgqongqoshe Wezemvelo u-Dkt. Edna Molewa uhloniphe abaqaphi bezemvelo wababiza ‘ngabaqaphi beziqiwu’ ngo ba ngegalelo elikhulu aba nalo ukulwisana nobuge bengu kwezemvelo, obufana nokubulala obhejane.
“Onyakeni odlule balinganiselwa kwi1 659 abaqaphi bezemvelo abasatshalaliswe ezindaweni ezidume kakhulu ngokubulala obhejane ukuze basize ngokuvikela ezemvelo.
Laba baqaphi bazokhuthazwa ukuba babe amanxusa obhejane kulezi zindawo,” ngokusho kukaNgqongqoshe.
UNyawo wayeyingxenye yethimba elabamba ozinge -la abulale obhejane esiqiwini Umkhuze Game Reserve, okwa holela ekuboshweni kwabathile ngobugebengu.
“Ngiyaziqhenya ngemizamo yami kuleli cala, ulwazi lwangisiza kakhulu ngoba ilona olwaholela ekubanjweni kwa lowo owayezingela abulale obhejane,” kusho uNyawo.
Lolu hlelo selube ingqayizive le lwasiza ngokubamba, uku phenya nokuboshwa kwalabo abazingela babulale obhejane; lwehlisa ukubulawa kwezilwane zasendle ngama-50%; lwaqikelela ukuthi ukuzingelwa kwezilwane kwehla nga ma-76%.

title: Bami ngomumo basungula amathuba omsebenzi
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Ngalolu hlelo sekuqashwe abantu abangaphezulu kwezi5 000 abaphuma emiphakathi ni entulayo futhi baqeqeshwa baqwashiswa ngomlilo, ezemfundo, ukunqanda nokuvimba umlilo nakwamanye amakhono, afana nosizo lokuqa la, ukubaza, ukupheka, ezempilo, ukuphepha nezokuxhu mana.
ULebogang Maseko wezokuxhumana kwi-WOF uthi lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubantu abasha futhi luqasha abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka uku ze basebenze ezizindeni zalo ezisezifundazweni.
“Sigcizelela kakhulu eku -thuthukiseni amakhono futhi siqasha abantu abasha abasa phuma esikoleni noma abasanda kuthola iziqu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Kula ba abaqashwe ngalolu hlelo, abangama-94% abantu abasha, abangama-31% abantu besi fazane kuthi abayi-3% kube abantu abaphila nokukhubaze ka,” egcizelela.
ULorraine Mokoena (one minyaka yobudala engama-31) waseMpumalanga ungomunye wabaqashiwe futhi osezuze kulolu hlelo. Usesebenze iminyaka eyi-11 esebenzela i-WOF.
Emva kokuphothula umateku letsheni, waba nenkinga engawutholi umsebenzi iminyaka emibili. Udadewabo wamtshela ngohlelo lwe-WOF.
“Uhlelo lokufaka isicelo lwalungelula neze. Ukuba qa tha inqubo esemqoka kakhulu kulo msebenzi futhi abantu aba zoqashwa bavocavocwa kanzi -ma. Uma uphumelela lokhu ku fanele uxilongwe ngodokotela kulapho-ke uzoqala uqeqeshelwe ukuba isicishamlilo,” esala ndisa.
UMokoena waqala eyisi cishamlilo esisezingeni eliphansi wasebenza wanyuselwa esikhundleni lapho engomunye wabaholi abaqavile, uhola izicishamlilo eziyi-18.
“Lo msebenzi uyishintshile impilo yami. Ekhaya imina ngedwa engisebenzayo ukusiza odadewethu nabafowethu kanye nezingane ezimbili.
Manje ngiyakwazi ukunakeke la umndeni wami ngikhokhele nezingane zami esikoleni,” ngokusho kukaMokoena.”Uvumile khona ukuthi ukuba isicishamlilo ngokujwayelekile umsebenzi wabantu besilisa futhi usefunde ukuba isikhondlakhondla kulo msebenzi njengoba engumuntu wesifazane.  UMokoena ufisa ukuba umph athi olawula konke eminyakeni emibili ezayo. Lokhu kuzomenza angamele wonke amaqem bu e-WOF azinze eMpumalanga.
Njengoba isikhathi samaqubu la omlilo sisondele, uMokoe na usinikeze izixwayiso ezi landelayo zokuvikela umlilo wequbula:  • Ungashisi umlilo endaweni evulelekile uma uzohlulwa ukuwulawula.
• Qikelela ukuthi uthola usizo olwanele nezinsiza ukuze ubhekane nakho konke oku ngenzeka.
• Ungawushiyi umlilo ungaqa shwe muntu.
• Bheka isimo sezulu.
• Ungashisi esigangeni uma kushisa kakhulu noma kunomoya.

title: Umshayeli wezikebhe ushisa izikhotha
author: Allison Cooper
text:
UMdletshe ongowokuda buka eSayidi wase efunda e-St Faiths.
“Kwakumnandi kakhu lu lapho ngakhulela kho na. Kwakungekho kwesa ba, kungafani nezinsuku zanamhlanje, futhi wonke umuntu wayekhuliswa u mphakathi.”UMdletshe waphothu la umatikuletsheni wakhe ngowezi-2006, ngaphambi kokulibangisa e-Durban University of Technology wayofundela iNational Di ploma  kuMaritime Studies ngowezi-2007.
Emva kokuphothula izi nga lakhe leS1 ngowe zi-2007 kanye neleS2 ngowezi-2008 waqhube ka nokuqeqeshwa kwa khe olwandle iminyaka emithathu, kanye ne-Safma rine Shipping Company.
Lapha wafunda khona ukuthi ushayelwa kanja ni umkhumbi wempahla, maphakathi nolwandle fu -thi bema nasemachwebeni ahlukahlukene e-Europe, e-Afrika nase-Asia ngemi sebenzi ehlobene nemithwa lo kanye nezinhlolovo zezo kuphepha.
Wathola iziqu zakhe zo kuqala eneminyaka enga ma-25, ngenkathi epho thula iziqu zakhe zeMa ster’s  kuPort Operations  ngesikhathi esifanayo. Iziqu zakhe zeMaster’s  zimenze wafaneleka ukuba umsha yeli wezikebhe oqeqeshi we. “Lokhu kwakuyinsele le enkulu kakhulu kimina ngoba ukuba umshayeli wezikebhe akudingi ukuba umuntu abe neziqu zemfu ndo, kudinga iS1, S2 no kuqeqeshwa olwandle.  Kuba ngemva kwalokhu kuphela lapho abantu beye babhalisele ukuba umsha yeli wezikebhe. Ngenza kokubili ngesikhathi esi sodwa. Emva komsebenzi, ngangiye ngihambe ngiye esikoleni, ngifunde konke okwakwenziwe ngalelo la nga,” kusho yena.
UMdletshe uyakuthanda ukuba semanzini. “Ama nzi akutshela okuningi ngokuthi usuku oluzayo luzolethani. Ngezinye izi nsuku kuzolile, kwezinye kuba kubi kanti kwezinye kuqubuka amagagasi ama khulu, ngakho-ke kuni ngi nje okwenzekayo olwa ndle! Imikhumbi iphinde ibe nemimo eyahlukene fu thi ithwala imithwalo eya hlukene, okuchaza ukuthi kufanele iphathwe nge ndlela ehlukile,” kusho u Mdletshe, okuthokozelayo ukusebenza namathimba anabantu abahlukahlukene, nabavela emazweni ahlu kene.
Umsebenzi onezinseleleUkuba umuntu wesifazane emkhakheni wezokuthutha ngemikhumbi akulula neze kusho uMdletshe, obeka izi nkinga ezigxile kwezobulili njengezinselele eziphambili njengoba kusewumkhakha obukwa njengowamadoda kakhulu.
“Yize noma abesifazane bezama ukuzishutheka no kusebenza kanzima ukuze babonise ukuthi lokhu oku shiwoyo akulona iqiniso, kungumsebenzi onzima. Nga kunqoba lokhu ngokuba ngi ngaphakamisi umoya, ngihla le ngicabanga ngokunethe mba futhi ngisebenze naba ntu ukuze bangihloniphe.
Ngokubelesela nokuzimise la, ungazinqoba lezi zithiyo,” kusho yena.
Impumelelo kaMdletshe yokunqoba lezi zithiyo iyabonakala ngendondo ayi hlomulile njengemenenja eyi bamba kwezobuchwepheshe bemikhumbi nolwandle.
“Ngahlomula ngendondo ngokuba ngovelele esikhathi ni esifushane ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi wami wathola u mphumela wocwaningo-ma bhuku ongenagcobho evikini lokuqala ngibambe kulesi sikhundla.” Waphinde wahlo mula ngendondo ‘yokuba yiqhawe’ ngoMfumfu wezi2017, ngokusiza imikhumbi esichothweni esasisibi kakhu lu esake sabonakala e-Durban.
“Ukuba umshayeli wezike bhe kuchaza ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi kufanele uqunge ube nesibindi,” kusho yena.
Ukuphothula iziqu zakhe ze-Master’s  kwaletha umehlu ko omkhulu. “Ukuthola iziqu zami kwaqinisekisa ukuthi ngithola ukuhlonishwa okukhulu ngabalingani bami besilisa. Bangibuza zonke izinsuku ukuthi ngimatasa ngani ngoba sibabili kuphela esesihambe leli banga futhi ngaba owokuqala ukuthola i-Maritime Diploma  eChwe beni lase-Durban. Lokhu kuphela kungenza ngibe ngovelele,” kusho yena, echa za ukuthi izifundo zokusebe nza emikhunjini nasolwandle akulula ukungena khona.  Umsebenzi Womshayeli WezikebheUMdletshe uyachaza ukuthi umshayeli wezikebhe cishe u lawula isikebhe sonkana kanye nabantu abagibele kuso.
Kufanele aqikelele ukuthi izimpahla zokuphepha ne zokucisha umlilo zisesimweni esifanele futhi ziqinisekisiwe ukuba ziyasebenza, aqhube inhlolovo yezokuphepha yaminyaka yonke esikebheni, aqikelele ukuthi ithimba lithola ukuqeqeshwa futhi asayine i zincwadi zabo zokuqeqeshwa, aqhube izibukezo zo kunganyelwa kokwenziwa komsebenzi, nokusiza abase benzi bakhe bahlanganise uhle lo oluthuthukisiwe ngokuha mbisana nomkhakha wabo womsebenzi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinqubomgomo zenkampani ziyathotshelwa kanye nokubhekelela izitolo nokufaka ama-oda amathu luzi okusebenza.
Usuku nje olujwayelekile lukaMdletshe luqala ngohla lwemikhumbi efikayo neha mbayo, konke okufanele kuqedwe ekupheleni kwe langa. “Siqala ukusebenza umsebenzi ophathelene ne mikhumbi ekuseni ngehora lesi-06:00 siqede ngehora lesi17:50 ntambama. Ngokuva mile, izikebhe ezimbili ezido nsa ezinye zisebenza nda wonye, futhi ngasinye sipho thula cishe imisebenzi eyi sishiyagalombili. Bese emva kwalokho, kufanele siqedele wonke umsebenzi obhaliwe.
Ezimweni eziphuthumayo, kwesinye isikhathi siqeda ukusebenza emva kwehora lesi-21:00 ebusuku,” kusho yena.

title: Ukuguqula Imfundo Ephakeme
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
Njengoba izwe libungaza Inyanga Yentsha, iVuk’uze nzele  ibukisisa ukuthi intsha yezwe ihlinzekwa kanjani ngamathuba nguMnyango wezeMfundo ePhakeme Nezokuqeqesha ukuze i phumelele.
Njengoba aqokwa ngoNhlo lanja njengoNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo ePhakeme No kuqeqesha, uNaledi Pandor  unikezwe umsebenzi wo kuqalisa uhlelo lwemfu ndo yamahhala kwaba mpofu kanye nalabo abazi wa njengezitshudeni ezingo ndingasithebeni.
Kulandela izibhelu zika zwelonke ngaphansi kwe siqubulo esithi: #FeesMu stFall , kwamenyezelwa  ngoZibandlela ukuthi intsha  evela emindenini lapho u mholo wakhona ungapha nsi kwezi-350 000 zamarandi ngonyaka izothola imfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme  nokuqeqeshwa. Ukuqali swa kokusebenza kwalolu hlelo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuzoqhutshwa esikhathini seminyaka emihlanu.
Isikimu SomfundazeUNgqongqoshe Pandor ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuqaliswa koku sebenza kwesikimu somfundaze ku yaqhubeka nga phandle kwe zinkinga.
“Isikimu esisha somfundaze siwuhlelo lukahulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika lokungenelela oluba luleke kakhulu futhi, empele ni, olwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngoba yintela yabo ekhokhela lokhu,” kusho yena.
Isikimu somfundaze sini kezwa izitshudeni eziqalayo enyuvesi kanye nasemako lishi oKufundela Umsebenzi Wezobuchwepheshe Bezandla Nokuqeqeshwa (ama-TVET), kuwona wonke amazinga e minyaka yemfundo.
Ukuze kuxhaswe isikimu somfundaze, imali kahulu meni eyengeziwe eyizigidigidi zamarandi eziyi-7.166 ibeke lwa eceleni ngowezi-2018 – kule mali, eyizigidigidi zama randi eziyi-4.581 ibekelwe izi tshudeni ezifanelekile ezifu nda emanyuvesi, ize ezigidigi di zamarandi eziyi-2.585 yona ibe ngeyezitshudeni zamako lishi ama-TVET.
UNgqongqoshe Pandor uthe amakolishi agxile emikhakheni ethile yezemfundo angase abe yizikhungo ezivelele ezaziwa ngokukhiqiza amakhono aphambili emikhakheni yazo.
Isibonelo, ikolishi elilodwa lingagxila kwezobunjiniyela bokukhenikha bese elinye ligxila kwezokushayelwa kwezindiza, kuchaza yena.
“Ngikholwa ukuthi ukugxila emkhakheni owodwa kukho -na kulele ikusasa lamakolishi,” kwengeza yena.
“Sifuna izinto ezahlukile. Asi funi wonke amakolishi enze into eyodwa.” Kusenjalo Uhlelo loku Thuthukiswa koSomabhizini si kwezeMfundo ePhakeme lwethulwa ngonyaka odlule ukuze kugqugquzele abantu abasha ukuba baqale ama bhizinisi abo.
Kuhloswe ngalo ukudidi yela intuthuko yamakhono wezamabhizinisi emkhakhe ni wemfundo yasenyuvesi eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu kubandakanya ukuba ngo somabhizinisi kwezemfundo, ukuthuthukiswa kosomabhi zinisi abayizitshudeni kanjalo nokuba ngosomabhizinisi emanyuvesi.  UNgqongqoshe Pandor uthe kusekuningi okudingeka kwenziwe ukuze kungagcinwa nje ngokusiza abantu abasha balungele ukusebenza, kodwa nokuba babe ngabasunguli bemisebenzi eseqophelweni.
Uthi angathanda ukubo na izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme zifundisa amakhono ezebhizinisi kuzo zonke izi fundo, lokhu kuyicebo eli ngasiza abantu abasebasha asebefundile bazisungulele amabhinisi abo amancane angase athuthukise ikusasa lezwe.

title: Umphakathi ugubha isivumelwano sokubuyiselwa umhlaba obize izigidi zamarandi ezingama-21
author: Siya Miti
text:
Umphakathi waseDouble Drift ngaseGrahamstown uhlangani sa abantu abayi-1 500 abaqha muka emindenini engama-264.
Basuswa emhlabeni wabo uhu lumeni waseCiskei ngowe-1991, ukuze kwakhiwe isiqiwi esasi nabanikazi abamhlophe.  Umphakathi usanda kuthola amatayitela omhlaba, owabu yiselwa kuwona ngokupha thelene nohlelo lokubuyiselwa komhlaba.
NgokukaNdunankulu waseMpumalanga Kapa uPhumulo Masualle, izigidi zamarandi ezi ngama-21 sezibekelwe ukubuyi selwa kwalo mhlaba futhi lokhu kuzokwenziwa ngezigaba.
“Lokhu kuyisinyathelo esi balulekile ngokuphathelene nokulondoloza imvelo kanye nokwenza izinguquko. Lesiqiwi sisathuthukiswa ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana nezinye iziqiwi futhi uhulumeni weseka umphakathi ngokuwuxhasa ngezimali, ngokunikela izilwa ne zasendle kanye nokuqeqe sha,” kusho uMasualle.
Umphakathi, ophethe isiqiwi ngokuhlanganyela Nesikhu ngo SaseMpumalanga Kapa Esibhekelele Iziqiwu kanye Nezokuvakasha (i-ECPTA) ngaphansi kwe-Likhayalethu Communal Property Association (i-LCPA), uthole izigidi zamarandi eziyisithupha Kumnyango Wezemvelo ukuze uthuthukise ibhizinisi lomnotho ovela kwezemvelo esiqiwini esingamahekthare ayi-1 400 owasithengelwa Umnyango Wokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zasemakhaya kanye Nezi nguquko Kwezomhlaba.
Usihlalo we-LCPA, uMxolisi Ngesi, uthe umphakathi wafaka isicelo sawo sokunxeshezelwa ngowe-1998. Ngowezi-2012, amalungu omphakathi anike zwa amahekthare angama 23 500 asephinde engezwa nga mahekthare ayi-1 400 esiqiwi.
“Sijabula kakhulu ngoba sigcine sikutholile lokho ebe sikufuna. Uhulumeni usixhase ngezimali ngokuphathelene nengqalasizinda. Sinezilwane zasendle ezihlanganisa amadube asentabeni ayi-10, izindlu zele eziyi-15 kanye nezimpofu eziyi-10,” kusho uNgesi, engeza nangokuthi kusazotholakala izinyathi kanye nezimpala maduze nje.  Wengeza nangokuthi umpha kathi wawuthola ukuqeqeshwa yi-ECPTA ukuze uqhube isiqiwi. “Sihlele ukwakha izindawo zokuhlala izivakashi (ama-lodge) ezimbili futhi sisakha izizinda zabaqaphi basesiqiwini kanye nesibaya okuzothululwa kuso izilwane,” kusho uNgesi.
Ngokufakwa kocingo olu ngamakhilomitha ayi-10 kanye nesango, kudalwe amathuba omsebenzi angama-61 emphakathini,” kusho Ungqongqoshe Wezemvelo u-Edna Molewa ngesikhathi sokudlulisela isiqiwi ngokusemthethweni.

title: Osozimboni abamnyama abenza amakhemikhali baseFreyistata badala amathuba emisebenzi
author: More Matshediso
text:
I-Kevali Chemicals iyinka mpani yabantu abamnyama yokuqala eFreyistata eyakha  amakhemikhali okulanza ama nzi, ezenhlanzeko kanye nawo kuhlanza izindlu zangasese kanye neglu yokunamathisela.
Le nkampani yasungulwa ngowezi-2014 abangani abahla-nu abangongoti ezimbonini zamakhemikhali, izimpahla ezithengisa ngokushesha, ukwe nziwa kwemikhiqizo, kanye nokunamathelisayo.
Umqondisi Wesigungu  Seziphathimandla we-Kevali Chemicals uFuneka Khumalo uthi i-BIS yaxhasa inkampani yakhe ukuze ithole imishini kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ukuze iqale ukwakha kanye nokukhiqiza izinsiza zokuhla nza amanzi, ukuhlanza kanye nokubulala amagciwane kanye neglu yokunamathisela.
 “Ekuqaleni kwadingeka ukuthi sifake imali ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kodwa ekugcineni sathola umxhaso Emnyangweni We-zohwebo Nezezimboni (i-dti) nge-BIS kanye neNkampani Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezimboni (i-IDC),’ kwengeza yena.
I-BIS iwuhlelo lomxhaso lweNqubomgomo Yosozimboni Abamnyama ehlose ukuvulela amathuba osozimboni abamnyama abasebenza kumnotho waseNingizimu Afrika ngenxa yokungenelela okuqonde oku-thile, okuphokophele ukuzuza okuthile nokuhlelwe ngendlela ethile okuphathelene kanye nokungaphathelene nezimali.
UKhumalo uthe kwabiza izigidi zamarandi eziyi-18 ukuze  ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kanye nezinyanga cishe eziyi-11 ukuze liqale ukwenza inzuzo.
Le nkampani ihambisa imikhi qizo yayo eNingizimu Afrika yonkana kanye nase-Uganda, eNamibia, kanye naseTanzania.
UKhumalo uthe umthelela inkampani enawo ezimpilweni zabantu bendawo mkhulu kunokudala amathuba emisebenzi.
“Ngaphezu kokudala ama thuba emisebenzi kubantu bendawo, sinohlelo lokutshala izimali ngokuphathelene neze nhlalo esisiza ngalo abesifazane baselokishini kanye nase-zindaweni zasemakhaya ukuthi baqale amabhizinisi amancane agxile ekwakheni imikhiqizo yokuhlanza ikhaya kanye nokuhlanza izindlu zangasese,” kusho yena.
Uthe osomabhizinisi abasebancane kumele bazi ukuthi akukaze kwaba lula ukuqala ibhizinisi kodwa akumele badikibale ngoba bazothokozela inzuzo yalokho ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.
Usekelangqongqoshe Wo mnyango Wezohwebo Nezi mboni uBulelani Magwanishe uthe i-Kevali Chemicals ibe yinkampani yokuqala ewungoti ngokuphathelene nomkhakha wamakhemikhali, ukukhiqizwa kwezemithi kanye namaplastiki eyagunyazwa ukuthi ixhaswe kusukela ekusungulweni kwe-BIS ngowezi-2016.
“Le nkampani izohlinzeka ngamathuba emisebenzi adinge ka kakhulu emiphakathini eya-khele i-Harrismith enamazinga aphezulu kakhulu okwentuleka kwemisebenzi,” kusho Usekela ngqongqoshe uMagwanishe.

title: Ukudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi entsha yase-KZN
author: Hlengiwe Ngobese
text:
Abantu abasha abangama-25 baKwaZulu-Natali sebethole ukuqeqeshwa baphide baqashwa ngenxa yokuvulwa kwemboni entsha yeMahindra.
Abasebenzi bathola  ukuqeqeshwa ngokuba mbisana nenkampani  yakwa-Mahindra kanye ne-AIH Logistics futhi bazohanjiswa e-India  ukuze bayothola okunye ukuqeqeshwa lapho kudi ngeka khona.
Ukulinga ukwakhiwa kwezimoto kwesikhungo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuli ndeleke ukuthi kukhiqizwe izimoto eziyizi-2 000 ngonyaka, bese ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kube yizimoto eziyizi-4 000 ngonyaka.
 “Ukutshalwa kwezimali kuhle ngokuphathelene nokuzethemba kwezama bhizinisi. Kuyaqhubeka nokukhombisa ukuthi  lapha KwaZulu-Natali siyindawo ekahle kwaba tshala izimali. Kuthu mela nomlayezo kulabo abalokhu bengabaza ukuthi i-Durban iyindawo ekahle ngokuphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali,” kusho Ungqongqoshe Wesifundazwe Wokuthuthu kiswa Kwezomnotho,  Ezokuvakasha Nezindaba Zemvelo uSihle Zikalala ngesikhathi sokwethulwa kwemboni.
Wathi amathuba okuqala okuqashwa azoqhamuka kule nkampani azoba ne-sandla ekwandiseni isibalo sabantu abanamakhono esifundazweni.
Omunye wabasebenzi ofunde wagogoda izifundo zobunjiniyela uSthembiso Mthembu okujabulela  kakhulu ukuthi useyasebenza.
“Bengihleli ekhaya unya ka wonke ngingawutholi umsebenzi. Leli thuba selingisize ukuthi ngikwazi ukuzinakekela ngiphi-nde nginakekele nomndeni wami futhi. Noma ngine ziqu ze-mechanical engineer ing bengingazi kangako ngokuphathelene nokuhla nganisa imoto. Uku qeqeshwa abasihlinzeke kona kusisize ukuthi sibe nokuzethemba ngokuphathelene namakhono,” kusho yena.
ISikhulu Sezemisebenzi Emhlabeni sakwa-Mahi ndra u-Arvind Matthew sithe inkampani iphokophe le ekutholeni ama-40% ezi nsiza zokwakha imoto zeveni ye-Pik Up kwabahli nzeka ngezinsiza kuleli.
“Ukuhlanganiswa kwePik Up kuyisinyathelo so kuqala ngokuphathelene nezinhlelo zesikhathi eside ezizokwenza ukuthi kwa nde amathuba emisebenzi kanye nokuthola izinsiza kulesi sifunda saKwaZulu-Natali,” kusho yena.

title: I-NHI iwuhlelo lezinsizakalo zempilo eziphuculiwe
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
UMotsoaledi ubekhulu ma kamuva nje enkundleni yabezindaba lapho ambule khona uMthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwe-NHI kanye noMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyelwa Kwezikimu Zezokwelapha.Le mithethosivivinywa izo phendla indlela yokufikelela kangcono izinsizakalo  zempi lo nge-NHI.
Umthethosivivinywa uyinguqulo yomthetho ewuhlaka.
Imithethosivivinywa eminingi ibhalwa yiminyango kahulu meni ngaphansi kokuqondi swa nguNgqongqoshe ofane lekile. UMthethosivivinywa kufanele ugunyazwe yiKha bhinethi ngaphambi kokuba uthunyelwe ePhalamende.
Ukwethulwa kwale Mithetho sivivinywa yomibili kusho ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isiseduze ekufinyeleleni izi nsizakalo zempilo ezingujike lele okusho ukuthi i-NHI ma duze nje izoba ngumthetho.
I-NHI yindlela yokuxhasa ngezimali ezoqinisekisa uku thi zonke izakhamuzi zase Ningizimu Afrika zihlinze kwa ngezinsizakalo zempilo ezibalulekile, kungakhatha liseki isimo sabo sokusebe nza kanye nokuthi bazokwazi na ukuba nabakufakayo ngqo esikhwameni.
UMotsoaledi uthe uhulume -ni wazi kahle kamhlophe uku thi abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi ngaphambi kokukhu luma nge-NHI, kunesidi ngo sokulungisa izinsizakalo zempilo ezikhungweni zokwe lapha zikahulumeni ezidonsa kanzima kuqala.
Uthe uhulumeni uzazi kahle izinkinga zekhwalithi embi kanye nokuntuleka koku sebenza kahle ohlelweni lwezempilo lukahulumeni.
UMotsoaledi uthe Uhle lo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwe zwe (i-NDP) luye lwayi gqamisa ngokungananazi nokuthi ekuqaliseni uku sebenza kwe-NHI, izinga eliphansi lezinsizakalo ze mpilo kanye nezindleko ezi khona zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele kudingeka kubhekanwe nazo.
Ngenkathi izichibiyelo ezi bhekiselwe kwiMithethosivi vinywa zidingidwa, umnya ngo uzoqalisa ukusebenza okungenani amaphrojekthi amane e-NHI, okuzobanda kanya izinsizakalo zempilo ezikoleni, izinsizakalo zempi lo zalabo abakhubazeke ngo kwengqondo, izinsizakalo zempilo zabesifazane aba khulelwe abanezinkinga  ngokukhulelwa kwabo ezi bhedlela ezingama-22 ezithi nteka kakhulu kanye nokwe lashwa komdlavuza (i-onco logy), ngosizo oluqondile eGauteng naKwaZulu-Natali, kodwa futhi nezinye izifunda -zwe zingashaywa indiva.
UMotsoaledi uphinde wathi izindleko zezinsizakalo ze mpilo embonini ezimele azi finyeleleki kuzakhamuzi ezi ningi, njengoba owayeLijaji Eliyinhloko uSandile Ngcobo ebekwe ukuba ahole iKho mishini yezokuNcintisana ukuze kuqhutshwe inhlolo vo ngezindleko zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele.
"Izichibiyelo esizethulayo zihlose ukuhlinzeka usizo oludingwa kakhulu yiziguli ezizithola zihlupheka kakhu lu," kusho yenaUMotsoaledi uthe isichibi yelo sokuqala soMthethosivi vinywa sizoqeda ukukhoki swa kwabantu imali engeziwe.
Izinkokhelo ezicazelwa  umthengi zichaza ukuthi isikimu sikhokha ingxenye ethile yesikweletu umhlinze ki kungaba isibhedlela noma udokotela ozimele – ayibize isiguli. Yonke enye ingxenye kumele ikhokhwe yisiguli kusuka ephaketheni laso.

title: Uma impilo ikujikijela ngolamula, batshale
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
Uhlelo Lokwesekwa No kuthuthukiswa Kwabalimi selusize abantu abasha aban jengoWayne Mansfield (one minyaka engama-33 ubuda la) wasePaarl, osuke ekubeni asebenze njengomdayisi kamalume wakhe eMakethe yaseKapa ngesikhathi esa funda isikole njengoba ma nje esedayisa olamula bakhe abatshale esiqeshini somhla ba asiqashile.
Eminyakeni eyishumi eye dlule, ngesikhathi engusoma bhizinisi oneminyaka enga ma-23 ubudala, uMansfield walahla ithuba lokusebenza epulazini ayebheka kulona olamula ukuze athengise kabusha. Ngaleso sikhathi  wayengenandaba nokulima.
Kodwa-ke, iminyaka emba lwa eyalandela, wawushi ntsha umqondo lapho ebona ukukhula kwesidingo sola mula.
"Ngaphinde ngabona uku thi abalimi babenza okwa kwenziwa yithina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo – babepakisha isitokwe sabo bese besidayisa eMakethe yaseKapa. Ngabona ukuthi kungekudala thina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo sizo phelelwa indawo yokudayi sa, "kusho yena.
Ngomnyaka wezi-2013, umlimi wasendaweni wavu ma ukucebisa uMansfield fu thi wamqashisela amahektha ayi-12 omhlaba. Waphinde wamfakela uhlelo lokunisela olwenza uMansfield akwazi ukutshala.
Ngonyaka wezi-2015, wa kwazi ukudayisa ngapha ndle lwaleli cishe amathani angama-31 kalamula futhi ngowezi-2016, lesi sibalo sakhuphuka kakhulu saba ngamathani angu-168.
Ngenxa yenkuthazo nosi zo oluvela kuHlelo Lokwe sekwa nokuThuthukiswa Kwabalimi okwamenza  wathola isibonelelo Sohle lo Oluphelele Lokwesekwa Kwezolimo (i-CASP) ngowe zi-2015, wakwazi ukubeka isisekelo esiqinile futhi wa -chuma njengomlimi.
Ukwandisa Nokuhlomisa AbalimiUhlelo Lokwesekwa Nokuthuthukiswa Kwabalimi luhlose ukwandisa noku chumisa imiphakathi yabantu ababengabonelelwa ngaphambilini, ikakhulukazi abahlomuli bohlelo Lokwabiwa Kabusha Komhlaba. Lu bhekelela abalimi abasafufusa, abalimela ukuziphilisa, aba limi abancane nabahwebayo.
Umqondisi wezinhlelo ze zinsizakalo zokuthuthuki swa kwezolimo kuMnyango weZolimo eNtshonalanga Kapa u-Shaheed Martin uthe lolu hlelo selusize abalimi bakwazi ukuzimela.
"Sisiza abalimi kusukela ekuqaleni. Lokhu ku sho ukuthi siyabasiza ngenqubo yokufaka izicelo ukuze bathole usizo lwemali yesi bonelelo futhi uma lezi zicelo zivunywa, siyabasiza ngokuqala umsebenzi nokukhiqiza," kusho yena.
Uchaze nokuthi u mnyango uthatha indlela ephelele fu thi unikeza ngokuphelele izinsizakalo zokweseka kwezolimo, kufaka phakathi ukwesekwa ngengqalasi zinda.

title: Izisu ezigcwele ziholela emiphumeleni engcono
author: More Matshediso
text:
hulumeni eNingizimu Afrika yonkana abakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo wesikole ngenxa yohlelo lukahulumeni oluqinisekisa ukuthi izisu zabo zigcwele ukudla okunempilo.
UMnyango Wezemfundo Eyisisekelo (i-DBE), ngoku- sebenzisa uHlelo Lokuhli- nzeka Ngokudla Okune- mpilo Ezikoleni (i-NSNP), usebenze waze weqa umgo- mo wawo wokuhlinzeka ngokudla kubafundi bakule- li abangama-75%.
Umqondisi we-NSNP kulo
mnyango, uNeo Rakwena, uthe izikole eziyizi-20 619 zipheka futhi ziphakele abafundi abalinganiselwa kuzi-9 032 622 ezweni nsu- ku zonke.
Uthe izikole ezingabanda- kanywanga ohlelweni ku- mele ziqonde emahhovisi esifunda uma zifuna ukuba yingxenye yohlelo.
Onyakeni wezimali wezi- 2015/16, isabelomali esabe- lwe lolu hlelo silinganise- lwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi- 5 703 zamarandi. URakwe-
na uthe imali esetshenziswa ohlelweni iyakhushulwa minyaka yonke ukuze ku- hlangatshezwane nokukhu- phuka kwamanani ezinto, is- abelomali sonyaka wezimali wezi-2017/18 silinganiselwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi-6.4 zam- arandi.
Lolu hlelo luqeda indla-
la yesikhashana futhi lube negalelo esimweni senhla- lakahle yabafundi.
Uthe, "Izingane eziningi zi- buya emakhaya adla imbu- ya ngothi, futhi kwabanye abafundi, ukudla kwase- sikoleni yikho kuphela ukudla abakudlayo ngosu- ku. Ukudla okutholakala esikoleni kubanikeza umd- landla wokufunda, bakwazi ukugxilisa umqondo kanye nokuzibandakanya eklasi- ni.”
Ukubhaliswa  esikoleni 
kanye nokuya esikoleni kwabafundi kuthuthukile ngenxa yohlelo lokuhlinze- kwa kwezingane ngokudla. Kamuva nje, iKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMbiko Wokuhlola i-NSNP odidiyewe uMnyango We- zokuhlela, Ukuqapha kanye Nokuhlola (i-DPME). Lo mbiko ubonakalisa impu- melelo kanye nezinyathe-
lo ezithathiwe ukuze ku- thuthukiswe lolu hlelo.
UMqondisi Wezokuhlo- la ku-DPME, uJabu Mathe, uthe inhlosongqangi yoku- hlola wukuhlola ukuthi ingabe i-NSNP iqaliswa ngendlela engaholela em- phumeleni omuhle ozohlo- mulisa abafundi maqondana nezempilo kanye nezemfu- ndo.
Ugcizelele ukuthi inhlo-
songqangi yohlelo isiyonke ukuthuthukisa isimo seze- mpilo  kanyene - sok ondlek a k wab afun - di ababuya eminde- nini edla imbuya ngothi eNingizimu Afrika. Lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubafun- di abafunda ezikoleni zika- hulumeni eziku quintile 1-3, okungamaphesenti anga- ma-60 ezikole ezinezingane eziqhamuka emindenini em- pofu eNingizimu Afrika.
Uhlelo  luphinde  lusize 
ukuqeda ubub ha emi - phakathini ngokudala ama- thuba omsebenzi.
"Ngenkathi kuhlolwa ku- tholakale ukuthi i-NSNP ihlinzeka abantu abalungi- selela abafundi ukudla ben- gaholelwa, abangaphezu kwezi-50 000 minyaka yon- ke, ngethuba lokukhokhe-
lwa isibonelelo semali yokugibela okungama-960 amarandi ngenyanga," ku- sho uMathe.
"Sekukonke kwakha inani lwezibonelelo eziyizigidi ezingama- 576 zamarandi ngonyaka ezisiza amalungu omphakathi."
Uhlelo luphinde lusimamise ukuqhutshwa kwemisebe- nzi ethuthukisa ezomnotho njengamabhizinisi aman- cane nasafufusa kanye nezigungu ezisebenza ngokubambisana, phecelezi ama-co-operatives okuyi- wo azuzayo njengabahli- nzeki bemisebenzi kulezo zifundazwe ezinezindawo ezihlinzeka ngemisebenzi eziqhelelene (KwaZulu-Na- tali, eGauteng, eMpumala- nga naseNyakatho Kapa).
Ukutholakala  kwemifi-
no endaweni kunamathu- ba okuhlomulisa izikole nemiphakathi kuphin - de kuthuthukise ezolimo zasendaweni.
Umbiko uphinde waveza ukuthi Ntshonalanga Kapa, iMpumalanga, iGauteng, iMpumalanga Koloni, i- Nyakatho Kapa kanye ne- Nyakatho Ntshonalanga yi- zifundazwe osekuneminya- ka  zaluqalisa  lolu  hlelo 
ngempumelelo.

title: I-Central Application Clearing House (i-CACH) Yowezi-2018
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Central Application Clearing House, ebizwa ngokuthi yi-CACH, umzamo wesikhashana woMnyango Wemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqesha yasungulwa uMnyango Wemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqesha ukuze isize abafundi abafuna izikhala zokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme abafisa ukungena oHlelweni LweMfundo Elandela
Ukuqeda Isikole Nokuqeqeshwa (i-PSET) kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi ibhekene nesimo lapho:
Befake isicelo kusenesikhathi ezikhungweni zemfundo abazikhethile kodwa izicelo zabo zachithwa, manje osekuphele isikhathi sokubhalisa kwesinye isikhungo.
Labo abazoba ngabafundi abangasifakanga isicelo ngoba bengakwazanga ukuthola imiphumela edingekayo kuBanga
le-11 ukuze babhalise kodwa bathole ukuthi imiphumela yabo yeBanga le-12 iyahlangabezana nalokho okudingekayo ukuze babhalise.
Abangazange basifake isicelo ngesikhathi ngenxa yesizathu esithile noma abangazange basifake nhlobo isicelo.
Abangazi nhlobo ukuthi bazofundani lapho beqeda umatikuletsheni.
Abazi kancane ngalokho abafuna ukukufunda kodwa abangenasiqiniseko ukuthi ingabe lo mkhakha ubalungele na.

Imisebenzi ehlinzekwa i-CACH
Izicelo zamathuba okufunda e-PSET (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi Obuchwepheshe, emakolishi emfundo yezobuchwepheshe namakhono emisebenzi kanye nokuqeqeshwa kanye ne-Sector Education and Training Authorities).
Ulwazi mayelana nosizo lwezimali (Ulwazi lwe-NFSAS).
Imisebenzi yokuthuthukisa amakhono omsebenzi (ukwelulekwa, ulwazi, iseluleko kanye nokuhlelela umsebenzi/ulwazi ngalokho ongakukhetha maqondana noxhaso kanye nokuthola imali yokufunda).
Ukwesekwa kwabafundela imisebenzi yezandla (Isikhungo Sokweseka Ukuthuthukiswa Kwemisebenzi Yezandla Kuzwelonke).

Imisebenzi ye-CACH iqala ngomhla ka 3 kuMasingana 2018, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa kusanda kuphuma imiphumela yokuhlolwa ye-NSC futhi izosebenza kuze kube sekupheleni kukaNhlolanja 2018.

I-CACH isebenza kanjani?
Isigaba 1: Abafundi abangasitholi isikhala ezikhungweni abafake izicelo kuzo, noma abafuna amathuba okufunda e-PSET, bangaxhumana ne-CACH kunombolo yamahhala (0800 356 635), iwebhusayithi (www.dhet.gov.za) noma ngomyalezo we-SMS ojwayelekile (thumela igama nge-SMS ku 49200) noma bangabhalisa online. Eminye imininingwane ungayithola ekhasini labo le- Facebook (CACH_SA).
Isigaba 2: Ama-ejenti azoshayela umfundi, ofuna isikhala sokufunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ucingo mahhala, ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sezingcingo, kubhaliswe nemininingwane kusizindalwazi se-CACH, kuhlonzwe umkhakha umfundi awubhalisele kanye nesifundazwe afisa ukufunda kuso.
Isigaba 3: Imininingwane eqondene nomfakisicelo kanye nemiphumela kamatikuletsheni kuzoqinisekiswa futhi kudluliselwe esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ngokuzenzakalela ukuze mhlawumbe umfundi abhaliswe noma
afakwe esikhungweni.
Isigaba 4: Imisebenzi ye-CACH izoqinisekisa imininingwane yomfundi futhi iyidlulisele ezikhungweni ezisenezikhala. Lapho kukhona izikhala, abafakisicelo behlangabezana
nakho konke okudingekayo, kuzoxhunywana nezikhungo ngqo.

Amaphuzu okumele Aqashelwe
I-CACH ayikwazi ukuqinisekisa umfakisicelo ukuthi uzosithola isikhala.
I-CACH ayikwazi ukubona ukuthi isikhungo sizomthinta nini umfakisicelo ukuze mhlawumbe athole isikhala.

I-CACH isiza abafakisicelo abangenasiqiniseko sokuthi bafuna ukufundani noma labo abangahlangabezani nalokho okudingekayo ukuze bangene Ohlelweni i-PSET?
Imisebenzi ye-CACH isebenza ngokubambisana neSikhungo Sokuthuthukisa Imisebenzi Kuzwelonke (i-NCDS) esiza ngokuhlinzeka ngolwazi lwezemisebenzi olunzulu kanye neseluleko mayelana:
Imisebenzi kanye nemikhakha efundwayo
Ukukhetha isifundo.
Ulwazi ngokuhlola kokuchibiyela.
Ukulungiswa kwemiphumela yakamatikuletsheni.
Amathuba okufunda ahlinzekwa uhlelo lwe- PSET.
Izindlela ezingakhethwa zoxhaso kanye nosizo lwezezimali.
Ulwazi ngezinqubo zesicelo kanye nezinsuku zokuvala.

title: UYolisa wenza ubuhlalu obumholela  empumelelweni
author: Dale Hes
text:
ukusukela ekuphileni impi- lo yobumpofu eMpumala- nga Kapa, ukuya ekutholeni uthando lwezobuciko kanye nomsebenzi wezandla futhi manje useqhuba eyakhe imi- hlangano yokucobelelana ngolwazi ukuze abelane ngamakhono akhe nabantu besifazane abangasebenzi. UFuma wazalelwa eloki- shini elingaphandle kwase- Queenstown eMpumalanga Kapa, ehlala endlini encane namalungu omndeni wakhe ayi-15.
“Umndeni wami wawunge-
nayo imali eyanele yokungi- hambisa esikoleni. Njengoba ngangingafundile, kwadinge- ka ukuthi ngithole indlela yami yokwenza imali,” kusho uFuma.
Wachitha amahora amaningi efunda  ukukhrosha  (uku-
nitha) wase eya eKapa eyo- hlala nodadewabo. UFuma wabe esezifundisa ukwenza umsebenzi wobuhlalu, wase ethuthela eMbekweni e-Paarl ukuyofuna amadlelo aluhlaza. “Babebaningi abantu ababe- funa okwenziwe ngobuhlalu. Ngokho-ke ngathatha imi- sebenzi embalwa eyenziwe ngobuhlalu ngase ngiyiqaqa isinyathelo ngesinyathe- lo ukuze ngithole ukuthi yayenziwe kanjani. Ngase ngizifundisa ukwenza imi- khiqizo yami ngase ngiqala ukuyithengisa e-Ikwezi Cen- tre ePaarl,” kusho yena.
UFuma  wayengomunye
wabakhiqiza umsebenzi wezandla abangama- 20 abakhethwa nguMasipala Wendawo wase-Drakenstein kanye ne-Drakenstein Local Tourism Association (DLTA), ukuze bayokwethamela uhlelo lokuqeqesha lwezinsu- ku ezine olwalusingethwe yi-Craft and Design Institute (i-CDI).
Uhlelo lwafundisa ababe- bambe iqhaza ukuthi bakhi- qize amasampula emikhiqizo ethandwa ngamakhasimende ezosiza abenza umsebenzi wezandla ukuthi bathuthu- kise amabhizinisi abo. “Emhlanganweni wokuco- belelana ngolwazi safundiswa ukuthi singazenza kanjani izinhlelo zethu zokuhlelela ibhizinisi. Ngibonga kakhulu ngaleli thuba, ngoba sengizo- kwazi ukuthuthukisa ibhizini- si lami,” kuchaza uFuma.
Imikhiqizo yakhe yobu-
hlalu kanye nekhroshiwe seyithengwe nangamakhasi- mende akude ako-Germany nako-Sweden.
“Bekuba nzima ngesinye isikhathi, kodwa ngenxa yokwesekwa yi-CDI kanye nomasipala, sengikwazile ukuqala ukwenza imali kanye nokweseka izingane zami ezine. Sekufezeka namani- ngi amaphupho ami,” kusho uFuma.
UYolisa wanquma ukuthi ufuna ukwedlulisela ulwa- zi kanye namakhono akhe kubantu besifazane abanga- sebenzi basendaweni, ukuze nabo baqale ukuzenzela imali abayidingayo ukuze beseke imindeni yabo.
“Okwamanje  ngiqhuba imihlangano yokucobelelana ngolwazi kanye nokuqeqe- sha endlini yami nabanye abantu besifazane abathathu abangasebenzi. Ngiyethemba ukuthi ngizokwazi maduze nje ukuthi ngibaqashe ebhizi- nisini lami,” kusho uFuma.

title: Uthando lukaNgaleka lokulima imifino lwamqhubela ebhizinisini
author: Hlengiwe Ngobese
text:
imifino egcekeni lakhe wayengazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uzoba nebhizinisi lezolimo elithengisela izi- tolo zendawo kanye nezi- nhlelo zokupha abafundi ukudla ezikoleni.
UNgaleka (oneminya- ka yobudala engama-67) ngowaKwaXolo ePort Shepstone, esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natali.
Ulima isipinashi, iklabishi, izaqathi, utamatisi, u-anya- nisi, ubhontshisi kanye nobhanana. Ibhizinisi lakhe liphumelele umklomelo wokhiqiza imifino ehamba phambili ngowezi-2016 ngesikhathi semiklomelo ye-Female Entrepreneurs Awards Yomnyango Wezoli- mo waKwaZulu-Natali.
UNgaleka uthe ngesikhathi
eqala ukutshala imifino, wayefuna ukusiza umndeni wakhe ukuthi uthole imi- funo kodwa le ntshisekelo
yakhe yamqhubela ebhizi- nisini. Useqashe nabantu besifazane ababili bendawo abasebenza epulazini lakhe. “Okwamanje ngitshala imifino yami emhlabeni ongamahekthare amabili kodwa awanele. Abantu bafuna imifino yami ngoba angisebenzisi umanyolo ona- makhemikhali ngisebenzisa umquba ovela ezibayeni,” kusho yena.
UNgaleka, owayenguthi-
sha, uthi waba nothando lwezolimo ngesikhathi esasebenza njengothisha eGcilima Primary.
“Bengibuya esikoleni bese ngiya emasimini. Ngangikuthanda kakhulu ukudla ukudla okunempi- lo. Ngesikhathi sengithatha umhlalaphansi into kuphela engangifuna ukuyenza uku- lima ngesikhathi engangi- ngenzi lutho ngaso”.
“Ngaqala ngesipinashi,
iklabishi kanye no-beetroot ngase ngiyokudayisa emtho- lampilo wendawo. Ngangi- buya uphele wonke umkhi- qizo wami nsuku zonke.
Lokhu kwangigqugquzela ukuthi ngitshale nakakhu- lu,” kusho yena.
UNgaleka uchaza ukuthi ukutshala imifino kunezi- nselele zako.
“Imifino ayithandwa aba- limi abaningi ngoba isimo sezulu kumele sibe sihle. Kumele singabandi noma singashisi kakhulu,” kusho yena.
Ngenzuzo uNgaleka aye- nze ebhizinisini lezolimo usethenge amanye amahe- kthare amathathu omhla- ba lapho ezotshala khona izihlahla zetiye.
“Sengithole nendawo engi- zoyithengisela izihlahla ze- tiye. Izihlahla zetiye zenza owoyela abadingekayo abe- lapha izinkinga zesikhumba ezifana nokuqubuka.”
UNgaleka wakhuthaza abantu besifazane uku- thi abangene kwezolimo ikakhulukazi njengoba kunemihlomulo eminingi.
“Ungakwenza egcekeni lakho bese uyakhula. Umhla- ba ugcwele amathuba aba- ntu besifazane.”

title: Abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle abawuvali umlomo ngezibiliboco zakuleli
author: Dale Hes
text:
Leli su liyingxenye yoku gubha Inyanga Yezokuvaka sha lapho umasipala eqoke amathimba ayisithupha  aselokishini laseThemba lethu nase-Pacaltsdorp uku ba amukele abavakashi  baphesheya kwezilwandle ngesidlo esihamba nazo zonke izibiliboco kanye nezikaqedisizungu.
Njengengxenye yokulungi selela ukubungaza lokhu, amathimba abehambele  ukuqeqeshwa okuhlobene nezokuvakasha nokupheka.
Bafundiswa amakhono  ahambisana nokuqala kanye nokuqhuba ibhizinisi, lapho injongo kungukukwazi uku gcina behlomula ngomholo embonini yezokuvakasha.
UNomzamo Entile (one minyaka yobudala enga ma-31) oyingxenye yamaqe mbu ayisithupha uhola ithi mba le-Explore our Hood, eli qhamuka eThembalethu. U-Entile wasungula i-Explore our Hood ukuze akhuthaze umoya wobunye e-George.
“Saqaphela ukuthi kwaku negebe phakathi kwemi phakathi eminingi yaseGeorge. Sifuna abantu beze emalokishini bazobona uku thi sinesiko lamaXhosa eliqa vile okufanele beze bazozi bonela lona,” kusho u-Entile.
Njengoba sekusondela iNya nga Yezokuvakasha, ithimba selivele liphothule ngempu melelo izivivinyo ezimbili zokulinga lolu hlelo, lemuke la amalungu abevakashile evela embonini yezokuvaka sha. “Sizibona sesikulungele futhi sinentokozo enkulu yokwamukela abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle.
Sethemba ukuthi lokhu ku zosivulela iminyango thina sonke yokuba sithole isipili yoni embonini yezokuvaka sha, nokuthi kuzobonisa uku thi amalokishi aseNingizimu Afrika anokuningi okunga thokokezelwa ngabavakashi bakuleli nabakwamanye ama zwe,’ kusho u-Entile.
IMenenja ye-George Tou rism uJoan Shaw uchaze wathi uhlelo lolu luzobonisa amasiko ahlukahlukene.
“Uhlelo lwethu lwe-Dine with Locals lumele isizwe esi nezinhlanga ezahlukahlu kene, lapho kuzobe kuboni swa ngamasiko angenga phansi kwayisihlanu, lapha ngibala elakwaXhosa, ela kwaVenda, elamaKhoi, elaseCape Malay kanye nesidlo sezidlo zasolwandle i-‘Snoek and Patat’,” kusho u-Shaw.
Emva kwalokhu, amathimba azobe eseba ngamabhizinisi aphelele ahlinzeka ngezinsiza i-George Tourism, bona-ke bazobe sebekhangisa futhi beqhuba uhlelo lokubatholela abavakashi.

title: EzeMpilo eLimpopo sezidlulisele ukunceli sa ibele eqophelweni eliphakeme
author: Kanego Lewele  no More Matshediso
text:
Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi azikho izindawo ezifane lekile emsebenzini lapho omama abaseyimidlezane bengakwazi ukukhama ubi si noma bancelisele khona izingane zabo ngesikhathi somsebenzi, ngenxa yalo kho-ke baye badikibale uku ncelisa ngoba phela bachitha ingxenye enkulu yesikhathi besemsebenzini bengahleli nezingane zabo.
Njengomzamo wokubhe kana nale nselele, uMnya ngo wezeMpilo eLimpopo sewethule undabizekwayo wokuqala ngqa oyigumbi  lokuncelisela noma lo kukhamela khona ubisi nga phakathi emahhovisi akho na.
Igumbi lokuncelisela  lethulwa nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo esiFundazweni uDkt Phophi Ramathuba.
Liqanjwe ngoMama A lbertina Sisulu esigubha imi nyaka elikhulu yokuzalwa kwakhe kulo nyaka.
Kwethenjwa ukuthi igu mbi leli ngeke nje ligcine ngo kweseka omama abancelisayo abasebenzayo kuphela, ko dwa lizophinde likhutha ze neminye iminyango  ukuba yeseke abesifazane abancelisayo ezindaweni zomsebenzi.
Abasebenzi bomnya ngo bangakwazi nokuba abazanyana babo babale thele izingane emsebenzini ngesikhathi sesidlo sasemini ukuze bazincelise ibele. Igu mbi lizophinde lisetshe nziswe nangomama abafuna ukukhama ubisi ngesikhathi somsebenzi.
Omunye wabasebenzi bo mnyango uMpho Kutumela nongumama wamawele a nezinyanga eziyi-11 ubuda la, umfana nentombazane, wesese kakhulu ngale nsiza.
“Igumbi lokuncelisela li zoba wusizo kakhulu kithina bomama ngoba lizophinde lisinikeze ithuba lokukhama ubisi lwebele ngokukhulule ka futhi endaweni ekukhu thazayo lokhu,” kusho yena.
Omama abavakashela u mnyango behamba nezi ngane zabo ngenxa yanoma yiziphi izizathu nabo ba zovunyelwa ukusebenzisa igumbi leli ukuze bancelise izingane zabo ibele.  UNgqongqoshe Wesifunda zwe uRamathuba uthe igu mbi i-Albertina Sisulu  Breastfeeding Room yilo lo dwa esifundazweni.
UNgqongqoshe Wesifu ndazwe uRamathuba wethe mba ukuthi lo mzamo uzo ba negalelo emkhankasweni wokukhuthazwa nokuvike lwa kwezinqubo zokuncelisa ibele lingaxutshwe nalutho ngenjongo yokuba impilo yengane ithuthuke kahle.
“Ubisi lwebele luqukethe wonke umsoco odingwa usa na futhi ayikho enye indlela yokulukhiqiza ngaphandle kokwemvelo,” kusho uNgqo ngqoshe Wesifundazwe.

 UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo esiFundazweni saseLimpopo uDkt Phophi Ramathuba ekakwe ngomama abancelisa ibele abebehambele umcimbi wokwethulwa kwegumbi lokuncelisa.
 Imihlomulo yokuncelisa ibele
• Ubisi lwebele luqukethe amasosha omzimba asiza ingane yakho ikwazi ukulwa namagciwane nezifo.
• Ukuncelisa ibele kunciphisa ingcuphe yokuthi ingane yakho ibe nama-aleji.
• Izingane ezisuke zinceliswe ibele lingaxutshwe nalutho isikhathi sezinyanga eziyisithupha ziba namathuba amancane okungenwa yizifo, izifo zokuphefumula, kanye nokuhlaselwa isifo sokuhanjiswa sisisu.

title: Amagagasi agcina izingane zingabi uvanzi emgaqweni
author: Vuyo Ndlovu
text:
I-Surfers Not Street Chi ldren iyinhlangano ehli nzeka ngezifundo zamahha la zokuhuhuluza emaga gasini ezinganeni ezihlala emgaqweni kanye nentsha eswele ehlala khona enka beni yedolobha.
Inhlangano iwumzamo ngqo wokubhekana nokwa nda kwezingane ezingena makhaya futhi uqinisekisa ukuthi intsha yenza okuthi le okuhle ngezimpilo zayo.
UMasipala weTheku usa nda kweseka le nhlangano ngokunikela ngamabhodi okuhuhuluza emagagasini ayi-10.
Amabhodi akhelwe izi nhloso zokuthuthuka fu thi akhiwe ngegwebu futhi asiza abahuhuluzi abasa yizimfundamakhwela uku ba bakwazi ukuntanta phe zu kwamanzi.
Imenenja yomnyango we zokuthuthukiswa kweze midlalo nezokungcebeleka kumasipala u-Teddi Adams uthe amabhodi lawa azosi za abahuhuluzi abasafu fusa.
“Umnikelo lo uyingxenye yecebo likamasipala lo kuthuthukisa ezemidlalo kanye nokuqinisekisa uku thi yonke intsha, kunga khathalekile ubuhlanga ne zinga, iyakwazi ukufinye lela izinsiza ezizoyileke lela ibe yimiqabavu emi dlalweni eyikhethile.”ULangelihle Nkosi (one minyaka yobudala eyi16) naye ongumhuhuluzi ubonge umasipala ngalo mnikelo.
“Ngiyakuthokozela ka khulu ukuhambela izifu ndo zokuhuhuluza emgaga sini ngoba zingisiza ngiqine emzimbeni futhi ngiyaku thanda kakhulu ukuhuhu luza emagagasini.” UNkosi ukhuthaze abanye abahu huluzi abasafufusa ukuba beze bazoba yingxenye yalo mkhankaso futhi bafunde kabanzi ngokuhuhuluza emagagasini.
USandile Mqadi ongumqe qeshi wokuhuhuluza ema gagasini we-Surfers Not Street Children Club, uthe inhlangano yayisophe uku fundisa izingane amakhono okuhuhuluza emagagasini njengendlela yokuzikhipha emgaqweni.
“Sihlinzekela izingane ezi hlala emgaqweni kanye na -labo abavela emiphakathini eyayinganakiwe ngapha mbilini. Izinsiza zethu zimahhala futhi yonke intsha eneminyaka esuka kwemihlanu iya kwenga ma-23 yamukelekile,” ku sho uMqadi.
Wengeze ngokuthi ama bhodi okuhuhuluza anike lwe umasipala azolekelela imizamo yabo kanti ziningi izingane esezizokwazi uku ba yingxenye yohlelo.
I-Surfers Not Street Chi ldren Club inikeza izifundo zokuhuhuluza emagagasini kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngo08h30 kanye nango-13h30.  Abanentshisekelo banga bhalisa ehhovisi le-Surfers Not Street Children e-North Beach.
Umasipala uphinde wani kela ngamanye amabho di okuhuhuluza ayi-10 kwabe-KwaZulu-Natal  Surfing Federation.

title: USithibe uphila impilo emnandi kakhulu enebala elimhlophe
author: Galoome Shopane
text:
“Asiwona umuthi noma izilwane njengokokucabanga kwabantu. Singabantu njengabo bonke ababantu."USithibe utholakala emikhakheni eminingi. Uwunobuhle omodelayo, osebenzisa imfashi ni ukuqwashisa abantu ngokuba nebala elimhlophe futhi uyi sishoshovu sabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka eFreyistata.
Uthe wakhula emndenini ongazange umenze azizwele ehlukile noma engathandwa ngokwanele ngenxa yokuba nebala elimhlophe.
"Ngangingaqondi ukuthi kungani ibala lesikhumba sami lehlukile kunelabanye abantu, ukuthi kungani ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ngiphumela phandle abantu bangibize ngamagama angalungile futhi bangibuke njengomuntu ongafanelwe ukuba kuleyo ndawo."Isihlamba esihambisana nokuba nebala elimhlophe senza uSithibe awubonge kakhulu umndeni wakhe, ubonga bona ngokuba ngumuntu wesifazane onamandla nozethembayo.
Ezinye izinkathi uSithibe aziqhenya ngazo kakhulu zi bandakanya ukuthola isicoco emncintiswaneni wonobuhle abanebala elimhlophe i-Miss Free State Albinism 2018 noku khethwa njengomunye wabadle umhlanganiso embuki sweni wemfashini i-Face of Free State Fashion Week 2018.
Njengoba uMandulo kuyi Nyanga Yokuqwashisa Ngo kuba Nebala Elimhlophe uSi thibe uthe kuzomjabulisa ka khulu ukubona nabanye aba ntu abanebala elimhlophe bephumela obala benza izinto ezimangalisayo emkhakheni wonobuhle kanye nakweminye imikhakha.

USithibe uphila impilo emnandi kakhulu enebala elimhlophe  Abantu abanebala elimhlophe bangazinakekela kanjani?• Gwema ukushiswa ilanga lapho ilanga lishisa kakhulu (ngehora lesi-9 ekuseni kuya kwelesi-3 ntambama).
• Gqoka impahla yokuzivikela okuyizigqoko zelanga ezinkulu, ihembe enokhola  nemikhono emide.
• Sebenzisa isigcobo sokuvikela ilanga kuzo zonke izindawo ezingashiswa ilanga, okungenani kube iSPF 30  uphinde uyigcobe njalo emuva kwamahora amabili uma uphandle elangeni.
• Vama ukuya kudokotela uye kohlola amehlo nesikhumba.
• Gqoka izibuko zelanga uma uselangeni.

title: Uhulumeni usiza imindeni
author: Dale Hes
text:
Inhloso yokuthi kube nesi gaba sempahla engakhokhe lwa intela yokuthenga wu kusiza imindeni ehola imali encane, esebenzisa ingxenye enkulu yomholo ukuthenga impahla yasendlini.
Impahla efakwe esiga beni sokunga yikhokhi inte la yokuthenga ayikhokhelwa i-15% yeNte la yeNtengo  (i-VAT). Ku hloswe ukuthi ilekelele izakha muzi zase Ningizimu  Afrika ukulo ndoloza imali.
Kunezinhlo bo zokudla  eziyi-19 ezi ngakhokhelwa i-VAT ezibanda kanya: impu phu, isitam bu, irayisi, isi nkwa esinsu ndu, izithelo, imifino, i nhlanzi esekanini namaqa nda.
Phezu kwalokho, impahla enjengodizili, uphethilomu nopharafini, kanye nezihli nzekelo ezithile okubanda kanya imiqasho, ezoku thutha ngojantshi nango mgwaqo kanye nezemfu ndo, azikhokhelwa i-VAT.
KuNhlolanja uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi uzo nyusa i-VAT isuke ku-14% iye ku-15%. Uhulumeni uya zi ukuthi imindeni eswe le izosindwa kakhulu  kwezezimali.
Ukuze kuthulwe umthwa lo wokunyuka kwezindleko zokuphila, uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali uNhlanhla Nene waqoka ithimba elalizoqha muka nezincomo zokuthi ngeziphi ezinye izimpahla ezidingeka emakhaya okwa kumele zifakwe esigabeni sokungakhokhelwa i-VAT.
Emuva kocwaningo olu nzulu nokubonisana no mphakathi, leli thimba lancoma ukuthi kunenye impahla okumele ifakwe ohlwini. Le mpahla ibanda kanya:
• Isinkwa esimhlophe• Ufulawa omhlophe• Ufulawa wamakhekhe• Imikhiqizo eqondene nokuya esikhathini kwaba ntu besifazane• Umfaniswano wesikole• Amanabukeni Le thimba laphinde lakhu thaza uMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke ukuthi uqiniseki se ukuthi zonke izinzuzo zoku ngakhokhelwa intela yoku thenga ziba ngezabathengi ku nokuba zibe ngezabakhiqizi.  Leli thimba laphakamisa nezinye izindlela zokuqhu beka nokusiza imindeni e mpofu, ngokuqinisa izinhlelo zikahulumeni ezinjengokuhli nzeka ngokudla okunomsoco kwamahhala, ukuhlinzeka ngemikhiqizo eqondene nokuya esikhathini kwabantu besifazane kanye nezibonelelo zomphakathi njengemikhakha okungandiswa imali esetshe nziswa uhulumeni kuyo.
Evotini yesabelomali somnya ngo wakhe uNgqongqoshe Nene wathi uhulumeni uzose benzela ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abampofu kakhulu aba linyazwa amazinga e-VAT.

title: Ukubhalisa umshado wesi ntu kuvikela imindeni
author: Dale Hes
text:
Umqondisi wezomthetho weKhomishana Yezokuli ngana Ngokobulili uMari ssa van Niekerk, uchaza imi shado yesintu kanye nama phuzu abalulekile okumele abantu bawakhumbule.
Vuk: Iyini imishado yesintu?MvN: Imishado yesintu iqhu tshwa ngokosiko nangoku sebenzisa izindlela zesintu ezilandelwa izakhamuzi za seNingizimu Afrika.
Vuk: Le mishado kumele ila ndele emiphi imithetho?MvN:  Imishado yesintu ilawu lwa ngokoMthetho Wokwazi sa Imishado Yesintu we-1998 (uMthetho 120 wowe-1998).
Kumele kwaneliseke izidingo ezilandelayo:
■ Bobabili abathintekayo ku -mele bavumelane ngoku shadana
■ Bobabili abashadayo kumele babe neminyaka engaphezu kweyi-18, ngaphandle kwalapho abazali noma abanakekeli ngokomthetho behlinzeke ngemvume lapho oyedwa noma bobabili bebancane ngokomthetho.
■ Umshado kumele ubha liswe kuMnyango Wezase khaya ezinyangeni ezi ntathu kushadiwe ukuze kuvikelwe izintshisekelo zabashadikazi, izingane kanye namalungu omnde ni uma kwenzeka kuba nesahlukaniso somshado noma ukufa.
 ■  Lapho kubhaliswa umsha do, abashadikazi kumele baphathe amakhophi oma zisi kanye nesivumelwano selobolo (uma sikhona).
Kumele kube nofakazi oyedwa okungenani ovela emndenini ngamunye.
 ■ Umyeni ofuna ukushada ngokwesintu okwesibili nomunye unkosikazi kumele afake isicelo enka ntolo.
■ Abantu abashade umshado wesilungu abanakungena emshadweni wesintu.
UMthetho Wokwaziswa Kwemishado Yesintu uthi bobabili abathintekayo e mshadweni banamalungelo alinganayo njengendoda ne nkosikazi.
Vuk:  Ngeziphi izinkinga ezi ngase zivele emshadweni wesintu?MvN: Ukungabhaliswa ko mshado kudala izinkinga ezi nkulu. Ukubhalisa kuhli nzeka ngobufakazi bokuthi impela umshado ukhona, ngakho kuba nzima ukufa kazela ubukhona bomshado ongabhalisiwe. Lokhu ku zoba nomthelela emandleni enkantolo okuvikela amalu ngelo abashadikazi lapho behlukanisa umshado, ukwa biwa kwamafa lapho ku nomshadikazi oshonile kanye namalungelo ezingane kanye namalungu omndeni.
Enye inkinga engase ibe khona wukuthi abashada umshado wesintu bavame ukupha mbanisa ukwahlukanisa u mshado nokwahlukana ngale komthetho. Kubalulekile uku gqamisa ukuthi yinkantolo kuphela enamandla okwa hlukanisa umshado. Aba shadikazi abahlukana ngale komthetho abazukuhlomula emithethweni elawula ukuqe dwa komshado.

title: Konke okumele ukwazi ngokuqala i-B&B
author: Dale Hes
text:
Nakhu konke okumele ukwa zi ngokuziqalela eyakho i-B&B.  Yini i-B&B? NgokoMkhandlu Oklama Amazinga Ezokuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika, i-Tourism Grading Council of South Africa, ama-B&B ahlinzeka ngendawo yokuhlala ehlinze ka ngemisebenzi ekhethekile kuphela engatholakala ekhaya. Igumbi ngalinye kumele libe nendawo yokugezela yalo, futhi isidlo sasekuseni kumele sibalwe emananini okuhlala.
Phezu kwalokho, igumbi kumele lilungiswe nsukuzonke ngenkathi isihambeli sakho sisahlala khona.
Ama-B&B akanakuba  namagumbi ezihambeli anga phezu kwamathathu. Uma amagumbi ezihambeli engaphezu kwalokhu, ibhinizisi lakho kumele lichazwe ngokuthi i-guest house .  Ngeziphi izinqubo oku mele uzilandele ukuze uqale i-B&B yakho?Isinyathelo sokuqala okumele usithathe ukuqonda kumasi pala wakho wasendaweni uye kofaka isicelo sokuthi umuzi wakho uklamwe njengesa khiwo sokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuhlala izihambeli. Ungase udinge ukuthola imvume kubanikazi bemizi owakhe lene nayo, nokufaka izaziso zokwazisa umphakathi, uma kwenzeka ufuna ukufaka iziphikiso.
Uma sewuthola isigunyazo e sivela kumasipala, kuzodinge ka ukuthi ulandele imithetho ethile emisiwe.
Izinto ezibalulekile oku mele uzibhekeIndawo – Indawo i-B&B yakho ekuyo ibaluleke kakhulu. Uma uhlala endaweni engazihehi izihambeli, akuzukuba lula ukuthi ibhizinisi lakho liphu melele.
Ezezimali – Ukuvakasha ku ngavama kakhulu ngezikhathi ezithile zonyaka, ngakho kudingeka ube nemali oyi bekile eyanele ukuthi ukwazi ukuphila ngezikhathi zonyaka ezingekho matasa.
Indlela yokuphila entsha  – Indle la ophila ngayo izoshintsha kakhulu uma sewungumni kazi we-B&B. Kuzodingeka ukuthi uvuke ekuseni kakhu lu uphinde ulale ebusuku kakhulu, futhi kuzodingeka ujwayele ukuhlalisana kahle nezihambeli emzini wakho.
Okunye okuzodingeka uku thi ukunake ukunakekela nokugcina izihambeli zakho zanelisekile ngaso sonke isikhathi.
Ukukhangisa nge-B&B yakho  – Umkhakha wezokuhlalisa izihambeli ugcwele ukunci ntisana, ngakho-ke kuzodinge ka unikele ngesikhathi sakho nemali ngokuthi ukhangise nge-B&B yakho. Kuzodinge ka ucabange ngezindlela zobuhlakani zokukhangisa ibhizinisi lakho.  

Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi ngoMkhandlu i-Tourism Grading Council of South Africa shayela ku: 011 895 3000.

title: Ingxoxo ephakathi kwamadoda: Yiba yindo da, mfana wami
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Ngesikhathi umdlwenguli owayehlome ngesikhali etshela lo mfanyana ukuthi akalale phansi futhi angabuki, usakuzwa na manje ukukhala kukadadewabo.
Ngemva kokudlwengula, le ndoda yatshela uTshepo noda dewabo ukuthi bagijime futhi bangabheki emuva. Ngesikhathi bethatha uhambo olubuhlungu lokulibangisa ekhaya, udadewa bo wamenza wathembisa ukuthi ngeke atshele muntu mayelana nokudlwengulwa. UTshepo wenza njengalokho ethembisile kodwa le mfihlo yamenza waba muncu.
“Ngesikhathi ngikhula,  ngangimbona umdlwenguli eKatlehong futhi ngaya ngokuba nolaka. Ngangingakwazi ukwe mukela ukuthi wayengazange ajeziselwe into ayenzile.”Ngesikhathi esekhulakhulile, futhi eyibhungu elinamandla, uTshepo wayengasakwazi uku gcina ngaphakathi ulaka lwakhe, futhi wayeshaya owahla sela udadewabo la embona khona. Wayeka ukuba yingane enokuthula waphenduka umuntu omusha onolaka.
Zimbili izinto ezasindisa  uTshepo kule ndlela yobudlova.
Okokuqala nje, wayebusiswe ngobaba kanye nomfowabo omdala ababazi ukuthi udlame lwalungeyona impendulo noma-ke babengazi ukuthi kungani uTshepo eziphatha ngale ndlela, bakwazi ukumholela endleleni yokuziphatha efanele.
Okwesibili kwaba ukungenelela kwamaphoyisa aqapha kuja ntshi wesitimela abona  ngesikhathi uTshepo ehlasela owadlwengula udadewabo.
Umdlwenguli wasala ephuke umlenze kodwa ngesikhathi uTshepo echazela ama phoyisa aqapha kujantshi wesitimela ukuthi le ndoda yayenzeni eminyakeni emini ngi edlule, akhetha ukumdedela kodwa amyala. Umdlwenguli wayiswa esibhedlela futhi aka zange alivule icala.
Ukuhlaselwa kwabantu be sifazane kuyaqhubeka nokuba yinto ejwayelekile, noma ku njalo, futhi-ke uTshepo wayeya ngokukhathazeka ngalokhu.
Ngesikhathi eyisitshudeni sasePretoria Technikon, wasiza ukusungula ithimba eliqwashi sa amadoda mayelana nendi ma yawo emphakathini fu thi ngowezi-2004, wabhalisa i-South African Men's Action Group (SAMAG) njengenhla ngano engekho ngaphansi kuka hulumeni.
Namhlanje, i-SAMAG isina basebenzi abasebenza ngoku gcwele abayi-10 futhi inamhho visi eGauteng, eFreyistata, eNyakatho Ntshonalanga, eLimpopo kanye naseMpumala nga. Izinikele ekugqugquzeleni izi-nguquko.
Umyalezo wabo oyinhloko uthi ‘Real men don’t abuse women’  (Amadoda angempela awabahlu kumezi abantu besifazane)’.
“U-Real umele la magama esi Ngisi: uResponsible, Enlightened , Archetypal  (ukuba yisibone lo) kanye noLoving ,” kusho  uTshepo.
“Iningi lamadoda lifunzelelwe ukuba yizinhloko kwabesilisa.
Babeshaywa besebancane futhi ababoni ukuthi kungani kunga mele bakhulise izingane zabo ngendlela efanayo.
